manzils.text: Qaaf bohat bari shan walay iss quran ki qasam
bulkay enhen tajjub maloom hua kay inn kay pass inhi mein say aik aagah kerney wala aaya to kafiron ney kaha kay yeh aik ajeeb cheez hai
kiya jabb hum mar ker mitti hojayen gay phir yeh wapsi door (az aqal) hai
Zamin jo kuch inn mein say ghatati hai who humen maloom hai aur humaray pass sabb yaad rakhnay waali kitab hai
Buklay inhon nay sachi baat ko jhoot kaha hai jabkay who inn kay pass phonch chuki pus who aik uljhao mein par gaye hain
Kiya inhon nay aasman ko apnay uper nahi dekha? Kay hum ney ussay kiss tarah banaya aur zeenat di hai iss mein koi shigaf nahi
Aur zamin ko hum ney bicha diya hai aur iss mein hum ney pahaar daal diye hain aur iss mein hum ney qisam qisam ki khushnuma cheezen uga di hain
Takay her rujoo kernay walay bandey kay liye beenaee aur daanaaee ka zariya ho
Aur hum ney aasman say babarkat pani barsaya aur iss say baghaat aur katney walay khet k ghallay peda kiye
Aur khujuron kay buland-o-bala darakht jinkay khoshay teh ba teh hain
Bandon ki rozi kay liye aur hum ney pani say murda shehar ko zinda ker diya. Issi tarah (qabron say) nikalna hai
Inn say pehlay Nooh ki qom ney aur rass walon ney aur samood ney
Aur aad ney aur firaon ney aur biradran-e-loot ney
Aur aeeka walon ney aur tubba ki qom ney bhi takzeeb ki thi.sab ney payghambron ko jhutlaya pus mera wada-e-azab inn per sadiq aagaya
Kiya hum pehli baar kay peda kerney say thak gaye? Bulkay yeh log naee pedaeesh ki taraf say shak mein hain
Hum ney insan ko peda kiya hai aur iss kay dil mein jo khayalat uthtay hain unn say hum waqif hain aur hum uss ki rag-e-jaan say bhi ziyadah uss say qareeb hain
Jiss din do lenay walay ja letay hain aik dayen taraf aur aik bayen taraf betha hua hai
(Insan) mun say koi lafz nikal nahi pata magar kay usskay pass nigheban tayyar hai
Aur mot ki beyhoshi haq ley ker aa phonchi yehi hai jiss say tu bidakta phirta tha
Aur soor phonk diya jayega.Wada-e-azab ka din yehi hai
Aur her shaks iss tarah aayega kay uss kay sath aik lanay wala hoga aur aik gawahee denay wala
Yaqeenan tu iss say ghaflat mein tha lekin hum ney teray samney say pardah hata diya pus aaj teri nigah bohat tez hai
Uss ka humnasheen (farishta) kahega yeh hazir hai jo kay meray pass tha
Daal do jahannum mein her kafir sirkash ko
Jo nek kaam say rikney wala aur hadd say guzar janay wala aur shak kerney wala tha
Jiss ney Allah k sath doosra mabood bana liye tha pus iss say sakht azab mein daal do
Iss ka humnasheen (shetan) kahega aey humaray rab! Mein ney issay gumrah nahi kiya tha bulkay yeh khud hi door daraz ki gumrahi mein tha
Haq taalaa farmaye ga bus meray samney jhagray ki baat mat kero mein to pehlay hi tumhari taraf waeed (wada-e-azab) bhej chuka tha
Meray haan baat badalti nahi aur na hi mein apnay bandon per zara bhi zulm kerney wala hun
Jiss din hum dozakh say poochen gay kiya tu bhar chuki? Woh jawab dey di kiya kuch aur ziyadah bhi hai
Aur jannat perhezgaron kay liye bilkul qareeb kerdi jayegi zara bhi door na hogi
Yeh hai jiss ka tum say wada kiya jata tha her uss shaks kay liye jo rujoo kerney wala aur pabandi kerney wala ho
Jo rehman ka ghaeebana khof rakhta ho aur tawajja wala dil laya ho
Tum iss jannat mein salamti kay sath dakhil hojao. Yeh hamesha rehney ka din hai
Yeh wahan jo chahyen unhen milay ga (bulkay) humaray pass aur bhi ziyadah hai
Aur inn say pehlay bhi hum boht si ummaton ko halak ker chukay hain jo inn say taqat mein bohat ziyadah thi woh shehron mein dhondtay hi reh gaye, kay koi bhagney ka thikana hai
Iss mein her sahib-e-dil kay liye ibrat hai aur uss kay liye jo dil say mutawajja hoker kaan lagaye aur woh hazir ho
Yaqeenan hum ney aasmanon aur zamin aur jo kuch iss kay darmiyan hai sab ko (sirf) cheh (6) din mein peda kerdiya aur humen thakaan ney chua tak nahi
Pus yeh jo kuch kehtay hain aap iss per sabar keren aur apnay rab ki tasbeeh tareef kay sath biyan keren sooraj nikalney say pehlay bhi aur sooraj ghuroob honey say pehlay bhi
Aur raat kay kissi waqt bhi tasbeeh keren aur namaz kay baad bhi
Aur sunn rakhen kay jiss din aik pukarney wala qareeb hi ki jagah say pukaray ga
Jiss roz uss tund-o-tez cheekh ko yaqeen kay sath sunn len gay, yeh din hoga nikalney ka
Hum hi jilatay hain aur hum hi martay hain aur humari hi taraf lot phir ker aana hai
Jiss din zamin phat jayegi aur yeh dortay huye (nikal paren gay) yeh jama kerlena hum per boht hi aasan hai
Yeh jo kuch keh rahey hain hum bakhoobi jaantay hain aur aap inn per jabar kerney walay nahi to aap quran kay zariyey enhen samjhatay rahen jo meray waeed (daraway kay wadon) say dartay hain
qasam hai bikherney waliyan ki ura ker
Phir uthaney waliyan bojh ko
Phir chalney waliyan narmi say
Phir kaam ko taqseem kerney waliyan
Yaqeen mano kay tum say jo wadey kiye jatay hain (sab) sachay hain
Aur be-shak insaf honey walahai
Qasam hai raahon walay aasman ki
Yaqeenan tum mukhtalif baat mein paray huye ho
Iss say wohi baaz rakha jatahai jo pher diya gaya ho
Bey savad baten kerney walay gharat kerdiye gayr
Jo ghaflat mein hain aur bhoolay huye hain
Poochtey hain kay yom-e-jaza kab hoga
han yeh woh din hai kay yeh aag per tapaye jayen gey
Apni fitna-perdazi ka maza chakho yehi hai jiss ki tum jaldi macha rahey thay
Be-shak taqwa walay log bahishton aur chashmon mein hongey
unn kay rab ney jo kuch unhen ata farmaya hai ussay ley rahey hongey woh to iss say pehlay hi nekokaar thay
Woh raat ko boht kum soya kertay thay
Aur waqt-e-sahar istaghfaar kiya kertay thay
Aur unkay maal mein mangney walon ka aur sawal say bachney walon ka haq tha
Aur yaqeen walon kay liye to zamin mein boht si nishaniyan hain
Aur khud tumhari zaat mein bhi to kiya tum dekhtay ho
Aur tumhari rozi aur jo tum say wada kiya jata hai sab aasman mein hai
Aasman-o-zamin kay perwerdigar ki qasam! kay yeh bilkul barhaq hai aisa hi jaisay kay tum baten kertay ho
Kiya tujhay ibrahim(alh-e-salam)kay moazziz mehmanon ki khabar bhi phonchi hai
Woh jab unkay han aaye to salam kiya ibrahim ney jawab-e-salam diya(aur kaha yeh to) ajnabi log hain
Phir (Chup chaap jaldi jaldi) apney ghar walon ki taraf gaye aur aik farba bachrey (ka gosht) laye
Aur issay unkay passrakha aur kaha aap khatay kiyon nahi
phir to dil hi dil mein unn say khofzada hogaye. unhon ney kaha aap khof na kijiye aur unhon ney uss (hazrat Ibrahim) ko aik ilm walay larkay ki bisharat di
Pus unki biwi aagay barhi aur heyrat mein aaker apney mun per hath maar ker kaha kay mein to burhiya hun aur sath hi banjh
Unhon ney kaha han teray perwerdigar ney issi tarah farmaya hai. be-shakwoh hakeem-o-aleem hai
(Hazrat Ibrahim alh-e-salam) ney kaha kay Allah kay bhejay huye (farishton!)tumhara kiya maqsad hai
Unhon ney jawab diya kay hum gunagar qom ki taraf bhejay gaye hain
Takay hum unn per kitti kay kankar barsayen
Jo teray rab ki taraf say nishan zada hain unn had say guzar janay walon kay liye
Pus jitney eman walay wahan thay hum ney unhen nikal liya
Aur hum ney wahan musalmanon ka sirf aik hi ghar paya
Aur wahan hum ney unkay liye jo dardnaak azab ka darr rakhtey hain aik(kamil) alamat chori
Musa(alh-e-salam kay qissay) mein (bhi humari taraf say tanbeeh hai) kay hum ney ussay firaon ki taraf khuli daleel dey ker bheja
Pus uss ney apney balbootay per mun mora aur kehney laga yeh jadoogar hai ya deewana hai
Bil-aakhir hum ney ussay aur uss kay lashkaron ko apney azab mein pakar ker darya mein daal diya woh tha hi malamat kay qabil
Iss tarah aadiyon mein bhi (humari taraf say tanbeeh hai) jabkay hum ney unn say khali aandhi bheji
Woh jiss jiss cheez per girti thi ussay boseedah hadi ki tarah (choora choora) kerdeti thi
Aur samood (kay qissay) mein bhi (ibrat) hai jab unsay kaha gaya kay tum kuch dino tak faeedah uthalo
Lekin unhon ney apney rab kay hukum say sirtabi ki jiss per unhen unkay dekhtay dekhtay (tez-o-tund) karakay ney halak kerdiya
Pus na woh kharay hosakay aur na badla ley sakay
Aur Nooh(alh-e-salam) ki qom ka bhi iss say pehlay (yehi haal ho chuka tha) woh bhi baray nafarman log thay
Aasman ko hum ney (apney) hathon say banaya hai aur yaqeenan hum kushadgi kernay walay hain
Aur zamin ko hum ney farsh banadiya hai pus hum boht hi achay bichanay walay hain
Aur her cheez ko hum ney jora jora peda kiya hai takay tum naseehat hasil kero
Pus tum Allah ki taraf dor bhag (yani rujoo) kero yaqeenan main tumhen uss ki taraf say saaf saaf tanbeeh kernay wala hun
Aur Allah kay sath kissi aur ko mabood na therao. be-shak mein tumhen uss ki taraf say khula daraney wala hun
Issi tarah jo log inn say pehlay guzray hain unkay pass jo bhi rasool aaya unhon ney keh diya ya to yeh jadoogar hai ya deewana hai
Kiya yeh iss baat ki aik doosray ko wassiyat kertay gaye hain
(Nahi) bulkay yeh sab kay sab sirkash hain to app inn say mun pher len. aap per koi malamat nahi
Aur naseehat kertay rahen yaqeenan yeh naseehat eman walon ko nafa degi
Mein ney jinnat aur insanon ko mehaz issi liye peda kiya hai kay woh sirf meri ibadat keren
Na mein inn say rozi chchta hun na meri yeh chahat hai kay yeh mujhay khilayen
Allah taalaa to khud hi sab ka rozi rasan tawanaee wala aur zor awar hai
Pus jin logon ney zulm kiya hai unhen bhi unkay sathiyon kay hissay kay nuisil hissa mileyga lehaza woh mujh say jaldi talab na keren
Pus kharabi hai munkiron ko unkay uss din ki jiss ka wada diye jatay hain
Qasam hai toor ki
Aur likhi hui kitab ki
Jo jhilli kay khulay huye warq mein hai
Aur abad ghar ki
Aur unchi chat ki
Aur bharkaye huye samandar ki
Be-shak app kay rab ka azab hoker rehnay wala hai
Ussay koi rokney wala nahi
Jiss din aasman thar tharaney lagay ga
Aur pahaar chalney phirney lagen gey
uss din jhutlaney walon ki (poori) kharabi hai
Jo apni behuda goee mein uchal kood ker rahey hain
Jiss din woh dhakkay dey ker aatish jahannam ki taraf laye jayen gey
Yehi wohi aatish dozakh hai jissay tum jhoot batlatey thay
(Abb batao) kiya yeh jadoo hai? ya tum dekhtay hi nahi ho
Jao dozakh mein abb tumhara sabar kerna aur na kerna tumharay liye yaksan hai tumhein faqat tumharay kiye ka badla diya jayega
Yaqeenan perhezgar log jannaton mein aur nematon mein hain
Jo unhen unkay rab ney dey rakhi hain uss per khush khush hain aur unkay perwerdigar ney unhen jahannam kay azab say bhi bacha liya hai
Tum mazay say khatay peetay raho inn aemaal kay badlay jo tum kertay thay
Baraber bichay huye shandar takhtay per takkiye lagaye huye aur hum ney unkay nikkah bari bari aankhon wali(hooron) say kerdiye hain
Aur jo log eman laye aur unki olad ney bhi eman mein unki perwi ki hum unki olad ko unntak phoncha dengey aur unkay amal say hum kuch kum na keren gey.her shaks apney aemaal ka girwi hai
Hum unkay liye meway aur marghoob gosht ki rail pail kerden gey
(khush tabaee kay sath) aik doosray say jam (sharab) ki cheena jhapta keren gey jiss sharab kay suroor mein to beyhuda goee hogi na gunah
Aur unkay gird unkay no-umer ghulam chal phir rahey hongey goya kay woh moti thay ji dhakay rakhay thay
Aur aapas mein aik doosray ki taraf mutawajja hoker sawal kerengey
kahen gey iss say pehlay hum apney ghar walon kay dar miyan boht dara kertay thay
Pus Allah taalaa ney hum per bara ehsan kiya aur humen tez-o-tund garum hawaon kay azab say bacha liya
Hum iss say pehlay hi uss ki ibadat kiya kertay thay be-shak woh mohsin aur meharban hai
To aap samjhatay rahen kiyoh kay app apney rab kay fazal say na to kaahin hain na deewana
Kiya kafir yun kehtay hain kay yeh shaeer hai hum iss per zamaney kay hawadis (yani mot) ka intezar ker rahey hain
Keh dijiye! tum muntazir raho mein bhi tumharay sath intezar kernay walon mein hun
Kiya inki aqlen enhen yehi sikhati hain? ya yeh log hi sirkash hain
Kiya yeh kehtay hain kay iss nabi ney khud qharh liya hai waqya yeh hai kay woh eman nahi latey
Acha agar yeh sachay hain to bhala iss jaisi aik (hi) baat yeh (bhi) to ley aayen
Kiya yeh baghair kissi(peda kernay walay) kay khud ba khud peda hogaye hain? ya yeh khud peda kernay walay hain
Kiya inhon ney hi aasman aur zamin ko peda kiya hai? bulkay yeh yaqeen na kernay walay log hain
ya kiya inkay pass teray rab kay khazaney hain?ya (in khazanon kay) yeh darogha hain
Ya kiya inkay pass koi seerhi hai jiss per charh ker suntay hain?(agar aisa hai) to inka sunnay wala koi roshan daleel pesh keray
Kiya Allah ki to sab larkiyan hain aur tumharay han larkay hain
Kiya tu inn say koi ujrat talab kerta hai kay yeh uskay tawaan say bojhal ho rahey hain
Kiya inkay pass ilm-e-gheeib hai jissay yeh likh letay hain
Kiya yeh log koi fareb kerna chahtay hain? to yaqeen kerlen kay fareeb khordah kafir hi hain
Kiya Allah kay siwa inka koi mabood hai? (hergiz nahi) Allah taalaa inkay shirk say pak hai
Agar yeh log aasman kay kissi tukray ko girta hua dekhlen tab bhi yeh keh den key yeh teh-ba-teh badal hai
Tu enhen chor dey yahan tak kay enhen uss din say sabiqa paray jiss mein yeh beyhosh kerdiye jayen gey
Jiss din enhen inka makar kuch kaam na dey ga aur na woh madad kiye jayen gey
Be-shak zalimon kay liye iss kay ilawa aur azab bhi hain lekin inn logon mein say aksar bey-ilm hain
Tu apney rab kay hukum kay intezar kein sabar say kaam ley be-shak tu humari aankhon kay samney hai subah ko jab tu uthay apney rab ki paki aur hamd biyan ker
Aur raat ko bhi usski tasbeeh parh aur sitaron kay doobtay waqt bhi
Qasam hai sitarey ki jab woh girey
Kay tumharey sathi ney na raah gum ki hai na woh terhi raah per hai
Aur na woh apni khuwaish say koi baat kehtay hain
Woh to sirf wahi hai jo utari jaati hai
Issay poori taqat walay farishtey ney sikhaya hai
Jo zor -aawar hai phir woh seedha khara hogaya
Aur woh buland aasmanon kay kinaron per tha
Phir nazdeek hua aur utar aaya
Pus woh do kamanon kay ba-qadar fasla reh gaya bulkay iss say bhi kum
Pus uss ney ALLAH kay bandaey ko wahi phonchaee jo bhi phonchaee
Dil ney jhoot nahi kaha jissay (payghumber ney) dekha
Kiya tum jhagra kertay ho iss per jo (payghumber) dekhtey hain
Issay to aik martaba aur bhi dekha tha
Sidrat-ul-muntaha kay pass
Issi kay pass jannat-ul-maawa hai
Jabkay sidrah ko chupaye leti thi woh cheez jo uss per cha rahi thi
Na to nigah behki na had say barhi
Yaqeenan uss ney apney rab ki bari bari nishaniyon mein say baaz nishaniyan dekha len
Kiya tum ney laat aur uzza ko dekha
Aur manaat teesray pichlay ko
Kiya tumharay liye larkay aur ALLAH kay liye larkiya hain
Yeh to abb bari beyinsafi ki taqseem hai

DAR-asal yeh sirf naam hain jo tum ney aur tumharay baap dadon ney inkay rakh liye hain Allah ney inki koi daleel nahi utaari yeh log to sirf atkal kay aur apni nafsaani khuwaishon kay peechay paray huye hain aur yaqeenan unkay rab ki taraf say unkay pass hidayat aa chuki hai
Kiya her shaks jo aarzoo keray ussay mayassar hai
Allah hi kay hath hai yeh hajaan aur woh jahaan
Aur boht say farishtay aasmanon mein hain jinki sifarish kuch bhi nafa nahi dey sakti magar yeh aur baat hai kay Allah taalaa apni khushi aur apni chahat say jioss kay liye chahye ijazat dey dey
Be-shak jo log aakhirat per eman nahi rakhtay woh farishton ka zanana naam muqarrar kertay hain
Halankay unhen iss ka koi ilm nahi woh sirf apney gumaan kay peechay paray huye hain aur be-shak weham(o-guman) haq kay muqablay mein kuch kaam nahi deta
To app iss say mun mor len jo humari yaad say mun moray aur jinka iradah ba-juz zindagan-e-duniya kay aur kuch na ho
Yehi inn kay ilm ki inteha hai aap ka rab iss say khoob waqif hai jo iss ki raah say bhatak gaya hai aur wohi khoob waqif hai iss say bhi jo raah yafta hai

Aur Allah hi ka hai jo kuch aasmanon mein hai. aur jo. kuch zamin mein hai takay Allah taalaa buray amal kerney walon ko unkay aemaal ka badla dey aur nek kaam kerney walon ko acha badla inayat farmaye

Inn logon ko jo baray gunahon say bachtay hain aur beyhayaee say bhi siwaye kissi chotay say gunah kay be-shak tera rab boht kushada maghfirat wala hai woh tumhen bakhoobi jaanta hai jabkay uss ney tumhen zamin say peda kiya aur jabkay tum apni maaon kay pet mein bachay thay pus tum apni pakeezgi aap biyan na kero wohi pehezgaron ko khoob janta hai
Kiya app ney ussay dekha jiss ney mun mor liya
Aur boht kuin diya aur hath kio rok liya
Kiya ussay ilm-e-ghaib hai kay woh (sab kuch) dekh raha hai
Kiya ussay iss cheez ki khabar nahi di gaee jo musa (alh-e-salam) kay kay
Aur wafadaar Ibrahim (alh-e-salam) kay saheefon mein tha
Kay koi shaks kissi doosray ka bojh na uthayega
Aur yeh kay her insan kay liye sirf wohi hai jiss ki kosish khud uss ney ki
Aur yeh kay be-shak uss ki kosish unqareeb dekhi jayegi
Phir ussay poora poora badla diya jayega
Aur yeh kay aap kay rab hi ki taraf phonchna hai
Aur yeh kay wohi hansata hai aur wohi rulata hai
Aur yeh kay wohi maarta hai aur jilata hai
Aur yeh kay ussi ney jora yani nar-o-mada peda kiya hai
Nutfay say jabkay woh tapkaya jata hai
Aur yeh kay ussi kay zimmey doobara peda kerna hai
Aur yeh kay wohi maaldar banata hai aur sarmaya deta hai
Aur yeh kay wohi sheyara (sitaray) ka rab hai
Aur yeh kay ussi ney aad awwal ko halak kiya hai
Aur samood ko bhi (jin men say) aik ko bhi baqi na rakha
Aur iss say pehlay Qom-e-nooh ko yaqeenan woh baray zalim aur sirkash thay
Aur motafiqa (shehar ya utti hui bastiyon ko) ussi ney ulat diya
Phir uss per cha diya jo chaya
Pus aey insan tu apney rab ki kiss neimat kay baray mein jhagray ga
Yeh (nabi) daranay walay hain pehlay daramay walon mensay
Aanay wali ghari qareeb aagaee hai
Allah kay siwa iss ka (waqt moayyen per khol) dikhaney wala koi nahi
Pus tum kiya iss baat say tajjub kertay ho
Aur hans rahey ho? rotay nahi
(Bulkay) tum khel rahey ho
Abb Allah kay samney sajday kero aur (ussi ki) ibadat kero
Qayamat qareeb agaee aur chand phat gaya
Yeh agar koi mojzza dekhtay hain to mun pher letay hain aur kehdetay hain. kay yeh pehlay say chala aata hua jadoo hai
inhon ney jhutlaya aur apni khuwaishon ki pairwi ki aur her kaam theray huye waqt per muqarrar hai
yaqeenan inn kay pass woh khabren aa chuki hain jin mein dant dapat (ki naseehat) hai
Aur kamil aqal ki baat hai lekin in darawni baaton ney bhi kuch faeedah na diya
Pus (aey nabi) tum inn say aeyraaz kero jiss din aik pukarnay wala nagawaar cheez ki taraf pukaray ga
yeh jhuki aankhon qabron say iss tarah nikal kharay hongay kay goya woh phela hua taddi dal hai
Pukarnay walay ki taraf dortay hongay aur kafir kahengey yeh din to boht sakht hai
Inn say pehlay qom-e-nooh ney bhi humaray banday ko jhulaya tha aur deewana batla ker jhirak diya gaya tha
Pus uss ney apney rab say dua ki kay mein beybus hun tu meri madad ker
Pus hum ney aasman kay darwazon ko zor kay menh say khol diya
Aur zamin say chashmon ko jaari kerdiya pus uss kaam kay liye jo muqaddar kiya gaya tha (dono) paani jama hogaye
Aur hum ney issay takhton aur keelon wali (kashti) per sawar kerliya
Jo humari aankhon kay samnay chal rahi thi badla uss ki taraf say jiss ka kufur kiya gaya tha
Aur be-shak hum ney iss waqaey ko nishani bana ker baqi rakha pus koi hai naseehat hasil kerney wala
Batao mera azab aur meri daraney wali baaten kaisi rahen
Aur be-shak hum ney quran ko samajhney kay liye aasan kerdiya hai pus kiya koi naseehat hasil kerney wala hai
Qom-e-aad ney bhi jhutlaya pus kaisa hua mera azab aur meri daraney wali baten
Hum ney unn per tez-o-tund musalsal chalney wali hawa aik peham manhoos din mein bhej di
Jo logon ko utha utha ker dey patakhti thi goya kay woh jarr say katey huye khajoor kay taney hain
Pus kaisi rahi meri saza aur mera darana
Yaqeenan hum ney quran ko naseehat kay liye aasan kerdia hai pus kiya koi hai naseehat hasil kerney wala
Qom-e-samood ney daraney walon ko jhutlaya
Aur kehney lagay kiya humi mein say aik shaks ki hum farmanbardaari kerney lagen? tab to hum yaqeenan ghalati aur deewangi mein paray huye hongey
Kiya humaray sab kay darmiyan sirf issi per wahi utaari gaee nahi bulkay woh jhoota shekhi khor hai
Abb sab jaan lengey kal ko kay kon jhoota aur shekhi khor tha
