Wohi hai jiss ney aasmanon aur zamin ko cheh (6) din mein peda kiya phir arsh per mustawi hogaya Woh (Khoob) jaanta hai uss cheez ko zamin mein jaye aur jo uss say niklay aur jo aasmanoon say neechay aaye. aur jo kuch Charh ker uss mein jaye aur jahan kahin tum ho woh tumharay sath hai aur jo tum kerahey ho Allah dekh raha hai
Aasmanoon ki aur zamin ki baadshahi ussi ki hai aur tamam kaam ussi ki taraf lotaye jatay hain
Wohi raat ko din mein lejata hai aur wohi din ko raat mein dakhil kerdeta hai aur seenoon kay bhedon ka woh poora aalim hai

Allah per aur uss kay raool per eman ley aao aur uss maal mein say kharch kero jiss mein Allah ney tumhen doosron ka janasheen banaya hai pus jo tum mein say eman leyen aur kheraat keren unhen boht bara sawab milay ga
Tum ALLAH per eman kiyon nahi latay ? Halankay khud rasool tumhen apney rab per eman lanay ki dawat dey raha hai agar tum momin ho to who to tum say mazboot ehad-o-paymaan bhi ley chukka hai
Woh (ALLAH) hi hai jo apney banday per wazeh aayaten utaarta hai takay who tumhen andheron say noor ki taraf ley jaye yaqeenan ALLAH taalaa tum per narmi kernay wala reham kernay wala hai

kertay' darasal aasmanon our zamin ke meeress ka malik (tanha) Allah hi hai tum main say jin logo ney fatah say pehlay fi subilillah diya hai our qitaal kiya hai woh (doosron kay) barabar nahi bulkay unn say boht baray darjay kay hain jinhon nay fatah kay baad kheyraaten den our jahad kiyey haan bhalaee ka wada to Allah taalaaka unn sab say hai jo kuch tum ker rahey ho uss say Allah khabardaarhai
Kon hai jo Allah taalaa ko achi tarah qarz dey phir Allah Taalaa issay uss kay liye barhata chala jaye our uss kay liye pasandeedah ajar sabit hojaye

(Qayamat Kay) din tu dekhay ga kay momin mardo our orton ka noor unn kay aagay aagay our unkay dayen dor raha hoga aaj tumhen inn jannaton ki khushkhabri hai jinkay neechay nehren jaari hain jin main humesha ki rehaeesh hai yeh hai bari kaamyabi

Uss din munafiq mard-o-orat eman walon say kahan gay kay humara intizar to kero kay hum bhi tumharay noor say kuch roshni hasil kerlen jawab diya jayega kay tum apney peechay lot jao our roshni talash kero phir inkay our unkay darmiyan aik deewar haaeel kerdi jayegi jiss main darwaaza bhi hoga uss kay androoni hissay main to rehmathogi our bahir ki taraf azab hoga

Yeh chilla chilla ker unn say kahen gey kay kiya hum tumharay sath na thay woh kahengay kay haan thay to sahi lekin tum ney apney app ko fitnay mein phansa rakha tha our intizar mein hi rahey our shak-o-shuba kertay raheyour tumhen tumhari fazool tamannao ney dhokay mein hi rakha yahan tak kay Allah ka hukum aa phoncha our tumhen Allah kay baray mein dhoka denay walay ney dhokay mein hi rakha
Algharz aaj tum say na fidya (aur na badla) qabool kiya jayega our na kafiron say tum (sab) ka thikana dozakh hai wohi tumhari rafiq hai our woh bura thikana hai

Kiya abb tak eman walon kay liye waqt nahi aaya kay unkay dil zikar-e-elaahi say our our jo haqutar chuka hai uss say narum hojayen our unki tarah na hojayen jinhen unn say pehlay kitab di gaee thi phir job inn per aik zamana dorazguzer gaya to unkay dil sakht hogaye our inn mein boht say faasiq hain
Yaqeen mano Allah hi zamin ko uss ki mot kay baad zinda kerdeta hai hum ney to tumharay liye apni aayaten biyan kerdin takay tum samjho
Be-shak sadqa denay walay mard our sadqa denay wali orten our jo Allah ko khuloos kay sath qarz dey rahey hain unkay liye yeh barhaya jayega our unn kay liye pasandeedah ajar-o-sawab hai

Allah our uskay rasool per jo eman rakhtay hain wohi log apney rab kay nazdeek siddiq our shaheed hain unkay liye unka ajar our unka noor hai our jo log kufur kertay hain our humari aayaton ko jhutlatay hain woh jahannomi hain

Khoob jaan rakho kay duniya ki zindagi sirf khel tamasha zeenat aor aapas main fakhar (o-ghuroor) our maal-o-olad main aik ka doosary say apney aap ko ziyadah batlana jaisay barish aur iss ki padawaar kisanon ko achi maloom hota hai phir job woh khushk hojati hai to zard rang main iss ko tum dejhtey ho phir woh bilkul choora choora hojatai hai our aakhirat main sakht azab aur Allah ke maghfirat our razamandi hai our duniya ki zundagi ba-juz dhokay kay saman kay our kuch bhi to nahi

(Aao) doro apney rab ki maghfirat ki taraf our uss jannat ki taraf jiss ki wussat kay barabar hai yeh unkay liye banaee gaee hai jo Allah per aur uskay rasoolon per eman rakhtay hain yeh Allah ka fazal hai jissay chahye dey aur Allah bara fazl wala hai
Na koi museebat duniya main aati hai na (Khaas) tumhari jaanon main magar iss say pehlay kay hum usko peda keran woh aik khaas kitab main likhi hui hai yeh (kaam) Allah taalaa per (bilkul)aasan hai
Takay tum apney say fol shuda kissi cheez per ranjeedah na hojoya kero our na attakerdah cheez per itra jao.our itranay walay shekhi khoron ko Allah pasand nhifarmata
Jo (khud bhi) bulkul keren aur doosron ko (bhi) bulkhul ki taleem dea Suno! jo bhi main pheray Allah beyniaz aur sazawaar hamd-o-sana hai

yaqeenan hum ney apney payghambaron ko khuli doleelen dey ker bheja our unkay sath kitab our meean nazilfarmaya. takay log adal per qaeem rahein aur hum ney lohey ko utara jiss mein sakht hebat-o-qooat hai aur logon kay liye aur bhi (boht say) faeeday hain aur iss liye bhi kay ALLAH jaan ley kay uski aur uss kay rasoolon ki madad bey dekhay kon kerta hai be-shak ALLAH qooat wala aur zabardast hai

Be-shak hum ney nooh aur ibrahim (aleh-e-salam) ko (payghumber banaker) bheja aur hum ney inn dono ki olad mein payghumbari aur kitab jari rakhi to inn mein say kuch to raah yafta huye aur inn mein say aksar boht nafarman rahey

Inn kay baad phir bhi hum apney rasoolon ko pay-dar-pay bhejtay rahey aur inn kay baad Essa bin mariyum(aleh-e-salam) ko bheja aur unhen injeel ata farmaee aur unn kay mannay walon kay dilon mein shafqat aur reham peda kerdiahaan rehbaniyat (tark-e-duniya) to un logon ney unn per issay wajib na kiya tha siwaye ALLAH ki raza joee kay so so unhon ney iss ki poori riyat na ki phir bhi hum ney unn mein say jo eman laye thay unhen unka ajar diya aur unn mein ziyadaah tar log nafarman hain

Aey woh logon jo eman laye ho ALLAH say dartay raha kero aur uss kay rasool per eman lao ALLAH tumhen apni rehmat ka dohra hissa dey ga aur tumhen noor dey ga jiss ki roshni mein tum chalo gey phiro gey aur tumharay gunah bhi moaaf farma dey ga ALLAH bakshnay wala meharbaan hai

yeh iss liye kay ehl-e-kitab jaan lein kay ALLAH kay fazal kay kissi hissay per bhi unhen ikhtiyar nahi aur yeh kay (sara) fazal ALLAH hi kay hath hai woh jissay chahye dey aur ALLAH hai hi bara fazal wala

Yaqeenan Allah Taalaa ney uss aurat ki baat suni jo tujh say apney shoher kay baray mein takraar ker rahi thi aur Allah kay aagay shikayat ker rahi thi Allah Taalaa tum dono kay sawal-o-jawab sunn raha tha be-shak Allah Taalaa sunnay dekhney wala hai

Tum mein say jo log apni biwiyon say zahaar kertay hain (yani unhen maa keh bethtay hain) woh dar asal unn ki maayen nahi bann jatin unn ki maayen to wohi hain jin kay batan say woh peda huye yaqeenan yeh log aik na maqool aur jhooti baat kehtay hain be-shak Allah Taalaa moaf kerney wala aur bakshney wala hai

Jo log apni biwiyon say zahaar keren phir apni kahi hui baat say rujoo ker len to unn kay zimmay aapas mein aik doosray ko haath laganey say pehlay aik ghulam aazad kerna hai iss kay zariye tum naseehat kiye jatay ho aur Allah Taalaa tumharay tamam aemaal say ba khabar hai

Haan jo shaks na paye uss kay zimmay do maheenon kay laga taar rozay hain iss say pehlay kay aik doosray ko haath lagayen aur jiss shaks ko yeh taqat bhi na ho uss per saathh (60) miskeenon ka khana khilana hai. Yeh iss liye kay tum Allah ki aur uss kay rasool ki hukum bardari kero yeh Allah Taalaa ki muqarrar kerda hadden hain aur kuffaar hi kay liye dard naak azab hai

Be-shak jo log Allah aur uss kay rasool ki mukhalifat kertay hain woh zaleel kiye jayen gay jaisay unn say pehlay kay log zaleel kiye gaye thay aur be-shak hum wazeh aayaten utaar chuken hain aur kafiron kay liye to zillat wala azab hai

Jiss din Allah Taalaa inn sab ko uthaye ga phir enhen unn kay kiye huye aemaal say aagah keray ga jissay Allah ney shumar ker rakha hai aur jissay yeh bhool gaye thay aur Allah Taalaa her cheez say waqif hai

Kiya tu ney nahi dekha kay Allah aasmanon ki aur zamin ki her cheez say waqif hai. Teen aadmiyon ki sirgoshi nahi hoti magar Allah unn ka chotha hota hai na paanch ki magar unn ka chatha (6th) woh hota hai aur na iss say kum ki aur na ziyada ki magar woh sath hi hota hai jahan bhi woh hon phir qayamat kay din unhen unn ka aemaal say aagah keray ga be-shak Allah Taalaa her cheez say waqif hai

Kiya tu ney unn logon ko nahi dekha? Jinhen kaana phoosi say rok diya gaya tha woh phir bhi iss rokay huye kaam ko doobara kertay hain aur aapas mein gunah ki aur zulm-o-ziyadti ki aur na farmaniy-e-payghumbar ki sirgoshiyan kertay hain aur jab teray pass aatay hain to tujhay inn lafzon mein salam kertay hain jin lafzon mein Allah Taalaa ney nahi kaha aur apney dil mein kehtay hain kay Allah Taalaa humen iss per jo hum kehtay hain saza kiyon nahi deta inn kay liye jahannum kafi (saza) hai jiss mein yeh jayen gay so woh bura thikana hai

Aey eman walo! Tum jab sirgoshi kero to yeh sirgoshiyan gunah aur zulm (ziyadti) aur na farmaniy-e-payghumbar ki na hon bulkay neki aur perhezgari ki baaton per sirgoshi kero aur uss Allah say dartay raho jiss kay pass tum jama kiye jao gay

(buri) sirgoshiyan pus shetani kaam hai jiss say eman daaron ko ranj phonchay. Go Allah Taalaa ki ijazat kay baghair woh enehn koi nuksan nahi phoncha sakta aur eman walon ko chahaiye kay woh Allah per bharosa rakhen

Aey musalmano! Jab tum say kaha jaye kay majlison mein zara kushagi peda kero to tum jagah kushada kerdo Allah tumhen kushadgi dey ga aur jab kaha jaye kay uth kharay hojao to tum uth kharay hojao Allah Taalaa tum mein say unn logon kay jo eman laye hain aur jo ilm diye gaye hain darjay buland ker dey ga aur Allah Taalaa (her uss kaam say) jo tum ker rahey ho (khoob) khabardaar hai

Aey musalmano! Jab tum rasool (PBUH) sau sirgoshi kerna chahao to apni sirgoshi say pehlay kuch sadqa dey diya kero yeh tumharay haq mein behtar hai haan agar na pao to be-shak Allah Taalaa bakshney wala meharban hai

Kiya tum apni sirgoshi say pehlay sadqa nikalney say darr gaye? Pus jab tum ney na kiya aur Allah Taalaa ney bhi tumhen moaf farma diya to abb (ba khoobi) namazon ko qaeem rakho zakat detay raha kero aur Allah Taalaa ki aur uss kay rasool ki tabey daari kertay raho iss (sab) say Allah (khoob) khabardaar hai

Kiya tu ney unn logon ko nahi dekha? Jinhon ney uss qom say dosti ki jin per Allah ghazab naak ho chuka hai na yeh (munafiq) tumharay hi hain na unn kay hain ba wajood ilm kay phir bhi jhoot per qasmen kha rahey hain
Allah Taalaa ney inn kay liye sakht azab tayyar ker rakha hai tehqeeq yeh jo kuch ker rahey hain bura ker rahey hain
Inn logon ney to apni qasmon ko dhaal bana rakha hai aur logon ko Allah ki raah say roktay hain inn kay liye ruswa kerney wala azab hai
Inn kay maal aur inn ki aulad Allah kay haan inn kay kuch kaam na aayen gi. Yeh to jahannumi hain hamesha hi iss mein rahen gay

Jiss din Allah Taalaa inn sab ko utha khara keray ga to yeh jiss tarah tumharay samney qasmen khatay hain (Allah Taalaa) kay samney bhi qasmen khaney lagen gay aur samjhen gay kay woh bhi kissi (daleel) per hain yaqeen mano kay be-shak wohi jhootay hain
Inn per shetan ney ghalba hasil ker liya hai aur enhen Allah ka zikar bhula diya hai yeh shetani lashkar hai koi shak nahi kay shetani lashkar hi khasaray wala hai
Be-shak Allah Taalaa ki aur uss kay rasool ki jo log mukhalifat kertay hain wohi log sab say ziyada zaleelon main hain
Allah Taalaa likh chuka hai kay be-shak mein aur meray payghumbar rahen gay. Yaqeenan Allah Taalaa zor aawar aur ghalib hai

Allah Taalaa per aur qayamat kay din per eman rakhney walon ko aap Allah aur uss kay rasool ki mukhalifat kerney walon say mohabbat rakhtay huye hergiz na payen gay go woh unn kay baap ya unn kay betay ya unn kay bhai ya unn kay kunbay (qabeelay) kay (aziz) hi kiyon na hon. Yehi log hain jin kay dilon mein Allah Taalaa ney eman likh diya hai aur jin ki taeed apni rooh say ki hai aur jinhen unn jannaton mein dakhil keray ga jin kay neechay nehren beh rahi hain jahan yeh hamesha rahen gay Allah inn say razi hai aur yeh Allah say khush hain yeh khudaee lashkar hai aagah raho be-shak Allah kay giroh walay hi kaamyaab log hain
Aasmanon aur zamin ki her cheez Allah Taalaa ki paki biyan kerti hai aur woh ghalib ba hikmat hai

Wohi hai jiss ney ehal-e-kitab mein say kafiron ko unn kay gharon say pehlay hashar kay waqt nikala tumhara gumaan (bhi) na tha kay woh niklen gay aur woh khud (bhi) samajh rahey thay kay unn kay (sangeen) qilay unhen Allah (kay azab) say bacha len gay pus unn per Allah (ka azab) aisi jagah say aa para kay unhen gumaan bhi na tha aur unn kay dilon mein Allah ney rob daal diya aur apney gharon ko apney hi haathon ujaar rahey thay aur musalmanon kay haathon (barbad kerwa rahey thay) pus aey aankhon walo! Ibrat hasil kero
Aur agar Allah Taalaa ney inn per jila watni ko muqaddar na ker diya hota to yaqeenan enhen duniya mein azab deta aur aakhirat mein (to) inn kay liye aag ka azab hai hi
Yeh iss liye kay enhon ney Allah Taalaa ki aur uss kay rasool ki mukhalifat ki aur jo bhi Allah ki mukhalifat keray ga to Allah Taalaa bhi sakht azab kerney wala hai
Tum ney khujooron kay jo darakht kaat dalay ya jinhen tum ney unn ki jaron mein baqi rehney diya. Yeh sab Allah Taalaa kay farmaan say tha aur iss liye bhi kay fasiqon ko Allah Taalaa ruswa keray

Aur inn ka jo maal Allah Taalaa ney apney rasool kay haath lagaya hai jiss per na to tum ney ghoray doraye hain aur na oont bulkay Allah Taalaa apney rasool ko jiss per chahaye ghalib ker deta hai aur Allah Taalaa her cheez per qadir hai

Bastiyon walon ka jo (maal) Allah Taalaa tumharay laray bhiray baghair apney rasool kay haath lagaye woh Allah ka hai aur rasool ka aur qarabat walon ka aur yateemon miskeenon ka aur musafiron ka hai takay tumharay dolat mandon kay haath mein hi yeh maal gardish kerta na reh jaye aur tumhen jo kuch rasool dey ley lo aur jiss say rokay ruk jao aur Allah Taalaa say dartay raha kero yaqeenan Allah Taalaa sakht azab wala hai

(fey kaa maal) unn mohajir miskeenon kay liye hai jo apney gharon say aur apney maalon say nikal diye gaye hain woh Allah kay fazal aur uss ki raza mandi kay talabgaar hain aur Allah Taalaa ki aur uss kay rasool ki madad kertay hain yehi raast baaz log hain

Aur (unn kay liye) jinhon ney iss ghar mein (yani madina) aur eman mein inn say pehlay jagah bana li hai aur apni taraf hijrat ker kay aaney walon say mohabbat kertay hain aur mohajireen ko jo kuch dey diya jaye iss say woh apney dilon mein koi tangi nahi rakhtay bulkay khud apney upper enhen tarjeeh detay hain go khud ko kitni hi sakht haajat ho (baat yeh hai) kay jo bhi apney nafs kay bukhul say bachaya gaya wohi kaamyaab (aur baa murad) hai

Aur (unn kay liye) jo inn kay baad aayen jo kahen gay kay aey huamray perwerdigar humen baksh dey aur humaray unn bhaiyon ko bhi jo hum say pehlay eman laa chukay hain aur eman daaron ki taraf say humaray dil mein keena (aur dushmani) naa daal aey humaray rab be-shak tu shafqat aur meharbani kerney wala hai

Kiya tu ney munfiqon ko na dekha? Kay apney ehal-e-kitab kafir bhaiyon say kehtay hain kay agar tum jila watan kiye gaye to zaroor bil zaroor hum bhi tumharay sath nikal kharay hongay aur tumharay baray mein hum kabhi bhi kissi ki baat na maanen gay aur agar tum say jang ki jaye gi to ba khuda hum tumhari madad keren gay lekin Allah Taalaa gawahi deta hai kay yeh qata’an jhootay hain

Agar woh jila watan kiye gaye to yeh unn kay sath na jayen gay aur agar inn say jang ki gaee yeh inn ki madad (bhi) na keren gay aur agar (bil farz) madad per aa bhi gaye to peeth pher ker (bhaag kharay) hon gay phir madad na kiye jayen gay
(musalmano! Yaqeen mano) kay tumhari heybat inn kay dilon mein ba nisbat Allah ki heybat kay boht ziyada hai yeh iss liye kay yeh bey samajh log hain

Yeh sab mill ker bhi tum say larr nahi saktay haan yeh aur baat hai kay qila band muqamaat mein hon ya deewaron ki aarh mein hon inn ki laraeeto inn mein aapas mein hi boht sakht hai go aap enhen mutahid samajh rahey hain lekin inn kay dil dar asal aik doosray say juda hain iss lie kay yeh bey aqal log hain
Unn logon ki tarah jo inn say kuch hi pehlay guzray hain jinhon ney apney kaam ka wabal chakh liya aur jin kay liye alam naak azab (tayyar) hai
Shetan ki tarah kay uss ney insan say kaha kufur ker jab woh kufur ker chuka to kehney laga mein to tujh say bari hun mein to Allah rab-ul-aalameen say darta hun
Pus dono ka anjam yeh hua kay aatish (dozakh) mein hamesha kay liye gaye aur zalimon ki yehi saza hai

Aey eman walon! Allah say dartay raho aur her shaks dekh (bhaal) ley kay kal (qayamat) kay wastay uss ney (aemaal ka) kiya (zakheera) bheja hai. Aur (her waqt) Allah say dartay raho Allah tumharay sab aemaal say ba khabar hai
Aur tum unn logon ki tarah mat ho jana jinhon ney Allah (kay ehkaam) ko bhula diya to Allah ney bhi unhen apni jano say ghafil ker diya aur aisay hi log na farmaan (faasiq) hotay hain
Ehal-e-naar aur ehal-e-jannat (ba hum) barabar nahi. Jo ehal-e-jannat hain wohi kaamyaab hain (aur jo ehal-e-naar hain woh na kaam hain)

Agar hum iss quran ko kissi pahar per utartay to tu dekhta kay khof-e-elahee say woh pust ho ker tukray tukray ho jata hum inn misalon ko logon kay samney biyan kertay hain takay woh ghor-o-fiker keren
Wohi Allah hai jiss kay siwa koi mabood nahi chupay khulay ka jannay wala meharban aur reham kerney wala

Wohi Allah hai jiss kay siwa koi mabood nahi badshah nihayat pak sab aeybon say saaf aman denay wala nighehbaan ghalib zor aawar aur baraee wala pak hai Allah unn cheezon say jinhen yeh uss ka shareek banatay hain

Wohi Allah hai peda kerney wala wujood bakshney wala soorat bananey wala ussi kay liye (nihayat) achay naam hain her cheez khuwa woh aasman mein ho khuwa zamin mein ho uss ki paki biyan kerti hai aur wohi ghalib hikmat wala hai

Aey woh logo jo eman laye ho! Meray aur (khud) apney dushmanon ko apna dost na banao tum to dosti say unn ki taraf payghaam bhejtay ho aur woh iss haq kay sath jo tumharay pass aa chuka hai kufur kertay hain payghumbar ko aur khud tumhen bhi mehaz iss waja say jila watan kertay hain kay tum apney rab per eman rakhtay ho agar tum meri raah mein jihad kay liye aur meri raza mandi ki talab mein nikaltay ho ( to inn say dostiyan na kero) tum inn kay pass mohabbat ka paygham posheeda posheeda bhejtay ho aur mujhay khoob maloom hai jo tum ney chupaya aur woh bhi jo tum ney zahir kiya tum mein say jo bhi iss kaam ko keray ga woh yaqeenan raah-e-raast say behak jaye ga

Agar woh tum per kahin qaboo paa len to woh tumharay (khulay) dushman ho jayen aur buraee kay sath tum per dast darazi aur zaban darazi kerney lagen aur (dil say) chahaney lagen kay tum bhi kufur kerney lagg jao
Tumhari qarabaten rishtay dariyan aur aulad tumhen qayamat kay din kaam na aayen gi Allah Taalaa tumharay darmiyan faisla ker dey ga aur jo kuch tum ker rahey ho ussay Allah khoob dekh raha hai

(musalmano!) tumharay liye hazrat ibrahim mein aur unn kay sathiyon mein behtareen namoona hai jabkay unn sab ney apni qom say bar mala keh diya kay hum tum say aur jin jin ki tum Allah kay siwa ibadat kertay ho unn sab say bilkul bey zaar hain. Hum tumharay (aqaeed kay) munkir hain jab tak tum Allah ki wahadaniyat per eman na lao hum mein tum mein hamesha kay liye bughz-o-adawat zahir hogaee lekin ibrahim ki itni baat apney baap say hui thi kay mein tumharay liye istaghfaar zaroor keroon ga aur tumharay liye mujhay Allah kay samney kissi cheez ka ikhtiyar kuch bhi nahi. Aey humaray perwerdigar tujhi per hum ney bharosa kiya hai aur teri hi taraf rujoo kertay hain aur teri hi tarf lotna hai
Aey humaray rab! Tu humen kafiron ki aazmaeesh mein na daal aur aey humaray paalney walay humari khataon ko bakhsh dey be-shak tu hi ghalib hikmat wala hai

Yaqeenan tumharay liye inn mein acha namoona (aur umdah pairwi hai khaas ker) her uss shaks kay liye jo Allah ki aur qayamat kay din ki mulaqat ki umeed rakhta ho aur agar koi roo gardani keray to Allah Taalaa bilkul bey niaz hai aur saza waar hamd-o-sana hai
Kiya ajab hai kay un qarib hi Allah Taalaa tum mein aur tumharay dushmanon mein mohabbat peda ker dey. Allah ko sab qudraten hain aur Allah (bara) ghafoor raheem hai

Jin logon ney tum say deen kay baray mein laraee nahi lari aur tumhen jila watan nahi kiya unn kay sath salook-o-ehsan kerney aur munsifana bhalay bartao kerney say Allah Taalaa tumhen nahi rokta bulkay Allah Taalaa to insaf kerney walon say mohabbat kerta hai

Allah Taalaa tumhen sirf unn logon ki mohabbat say rokta hai jinhon ney tum say deen kay baray mein laraiyan laren aur tumhen des nikalay diye aur des nikala denay walon ki madad ki jo log aisay kuffaar say mohabbat keren woh (qata’an) zalim hain

Aey eman walo! Jab tumharay pass momin aurten hijrat ker kay aayen to tum unn ka imtehan lo. Dar asal unn kay eman ko ba khoobi janney wala to Allah hi hai lekin agar woh tumhen eman waliyan maloom hon to abb tum enhen kafiron ki taraf wapis na kero yeh unn kay liye halal nahi na woh inn kay liye halal hain aur jo kharach inn kafiron ka hua ho woh unhen ada kerdo inn aurton ko unn kay mehar dey ker inn say nikkah ker lenay mein tum per koi gunah nahi aur kafir aurton ki namoos apney qabzay mein na rakho aur jo kuch tum ney kharach kiya ho maang lo aur jo kuch inn kafiron ney kharach kiya ho woh bhi maang len yeh Allah ka faisla hai jo tumharay darmiyan ker raha hai Allah Taalaa baray ilm (aur) hikmat wala hai

Aur agar tumhari koi biwi tumharay haath say nikal jaye aur kafiron kay pass chali jaye phir tumhen iss kay badlay ka waqt mill jaye to jin ki biwiyan chali gaeen hain unhen unn kay ikhrajaat kay barabar ada kerdo aur uss Allah Taalaa say dartay rahi jiss per tum eman rakhtay ho

Aey payghumbar! Jab musalman aurten aap say inn baaton per bait kerney aayen kay woh Allah kay sath kissi ko shareek na keren gi chori na keren gi zina kaari na keren gi apni aulad ko naa maar dalen gi aur koi aisa bohtaan na bandhay gi jo khud apney haathon pairon kay sath gharr len aur kissi nek kaam mein teri bey hukmi na keren gi to aap inn say bait ker liya keren aur inn kay liye Allah say maghfirat talab keren be-shak Allah bakshney aur moaf kerney wala hai
Aey musalmano! Tum uss qom say dosti na rakho jin per Allah ka ghazab nazil ho chuka hai jo aakhirat say iss tarah mayyus ho chukay hain jaisay kay murda ehal-e-qabar say kafir na umeed hain
Zamin-o-aasman ki her her cheez Allah Taalaa ki paki biyan kerti hai aur wohi ghalib hikmat wala hai
Aey eman walo! Tum woh baat kiyon kehtay ho jo kertay nahi
Tum jo kertay nahi uss ka kehna Allah Taalaa ko sakht na pasand hai
Be-shak Allah Taalaa unn logon say mohabbat kerta hai jo uss ki raah mein saff basta jihad kertay hain goya woh seesa pilaee hui emaarat hain

Aur (yaad kero) jabkay musa ney apni qom say kaha aey meri qom kay logo! Tum mujhay kiyon sata rahey ho halankay tumhen (ba khoobi) maloom hai kay mein tumhari janib Allah ka rasool hun pus jab woh log tairhay hi rahey to Allah ney unn kay dilon ko (aur) tairhaa ker diya aur Allah Taalaa na farman qom ko hidayat nahi deta

Aur jab marium kay betay essa ney kaha aey (meri qom) bani israeel! Mein tum sab ki taraf Allah ka rasool hun mujh say pehlay ki kitab toraat ki mein tasdeeq kerney wala hun aur apney baad aaney walay aik rasool ki mein tumhen khushkhabri sunaney wala hun jin ka naam ahmed hai phir jab woh unn kay pass khuli daleelen laye to yeh kehney lagay yeh to khula jadoo hai
Uss shaks say ziyada zalim aur kaun hoga jo Allah per jhoot (iftra) bandhay halankay woh islam ki taraf bulaya jata hai aur Allah aisay zalimon ko hidayat nahi kerta
Woh chahtay hain kay Allah kay noor ko apney mun say bujha den aur Allah apney noor ko kamal tak phonchaney wala hai go kafir bura manen
Wohi hai jiss ney apney rasool ko hidayat aur sacha deen dey ker bheja takay ussay aur tamam mazaahib per ghalib ker dey agar cheh mushrikeen na khush hon
Aey eman walo! Kiya mein tumhen woh tijarat batla doon jo tumhen dard naak azab say bacha ley
Allah Taalaa per aur uss kay rasool per eman lao aur Allah ki raah mein apney maal aur apni jaanon say jihad kero. Yeh tumharay liye behtar hai agar tum mein ilm ho

Allah Taalaa tumharay gunah moaf farma dey ga aur tumhen unn jannaton mein dakhil keray ga jin kay neechay nehren jari hongi aur saaf suthray gharon mein jo jannat adan mein hon gay yeh boht bari kaamyabi hai
Aur tumhen aik doosri (nemat) bhi dey ga jisay tum chahtay ho woh Allah ki madad aur jald fatah yaabi hai eman walon ko khushkhabri dey do

Aey eman walo! Tum Allah key madadgar bann jao. Jiss tarah hazrat marium kay betay hazrat essa ney hawariyon say farmaya kay kaun hai jo Allah ki raah mein mera madadgar baney? Hawariyon ney kaha hum Allah ki raah mein madadgar hain pus bani israeel mein say aik jamat to eman laee aur aik jamat ney kufur kiya tum hum ney mominon ki unn kay dushman kay muqabley mein madad ki pus woh ghalib aagaye
(saari cheezen) jo aasmanon aur zamin mein hain Allah Taalaa ki paki biyan kerti hain (jo) badshah nihayat pak (hai) ghalib-o-ba hikmat

Wohi hai jiss ney na khuanda logon mein inn hi mein say aik rasool bheja jo enhen uss ki aayaten parh ker sunata hai aur inn ko pak kerta hai aur enhen kitab-o-hikmat sikhata hai. Yaqeenan yeh iss say pehlay khuli gumrahi mein thay
Aur doosron kay liye bhi unhi mein say jo abb tak inn say nahi milay aur wohi ghalib ba hikmat hai
Yeh Allah ka fazal hai jissay chahaye apna fazal dey aur Allah Taalaa boht baray fazal ka maalik hai

Jin logon ko toraat per amal kerney ka hukum diya gaya phir unhon ney uss per amal nahi kiya unn ki misal uss gadhay ki say hai jo boht si kitaben laaday ho. Allah ki baaton ko jhutlaney walon ki bari buri misal hai aur Allah (aisay) zalim qom ko hidayat nahi deta
Keh dijiye kay aey yahudiyo! Agar tumhara daawa hai kay tum Allah kay dost ho doosray logon kay siwa to tum maut ki tamanna kero agar tum sachay ho
Yeh kabhi bhi maut ki tamanna na keren gay ba waja unn aemaal kay jo apney aagay apney haathon bhej rakhay hain aur Allah zalimon ko khoob janta hai

Keh dijiye kay jiss maut say tum bhagtay phirtay ho woh to tumhen phonch ker rahey gi pohir tum sab chupay khulay kay jannay walay (Allah) ki taraf lotaye jao gay aur woh tumhen tumharay kiye huye tamam kaam batla dey ga
Aey woh logo jo eman laye ho! Jummay kay din namaz ki azan di jaye to tum Allah kay ziker kay taraf dor paro aur khareed-o-farokht chor do. Yeh tumharay haq mein boht hi behtar hai agar tum jantay ho
Phir jab namaz ho chukay to zamin mein phel jao aur Allah ka fazal talash kero takay tum falah paa lo

Aur jab koi soda biktay dekhen ya koi tamasha nazar aajaye to uss ki taraf dortay jatay hain aur aap ko khara hi chor detay hain aap keh dijiye kay Allah kay pass jo hai woh khel aur tijarat say behtar hai. Aur Allah Taalaa behtareen rozi rasan hai

Tumharay pass jab munafiq aatay hain to kehtay hain kay hum iss baat kay gawah hain kay be-shak aap Allah kay rasool hain aur Allah janta hai yaqeenan aap uss kay rasool hain aur Allah gawahi deta hai kay yeh munafiq qata’an jhootay hain
Enhon ney apni qasmon ko dhaal bana rakha hai pus Allah ki raah say ruk gaye be-shak bura hai woh kaam jo yeh ker rahey hain
Yeh iss sabab say hai kay yeh eman laa ker phir kafir hogaye pus inn kay dilon per mohar ker di gaee abb yeh nahi samajhtay

Jab aap enhen dekh len to inn kay jism aap ko khushnuma maloom hon yeh jab baaten kerney lagen to aap inn ki baaton per (apna) kaan lagayen goya kay yeh lakriyan hain deewar kay shaharay lagee huin her (sakht) aawaz ko apney khilaf samajhtay hain yehi haqeeqi dushman hain inn say bacho Allah enhen ghaarat keray kahan say phiray jatay hain
Aur jab inn say kaha jata hai aao tumharay liye Allah kay rasool istaghfaar keren to apney sir matkatay hain aur aap dekhen gay kay woh takabbur kertay huye ruk jatay hain
Inn kay haq mein aap ka istaghfaar kerna aur na kerna dono barabar hai Allah Taalaa enhen hergiz na bakshay ga be-shak Allah Taalaa (aisay) na farmaan logon ko hidayat nahi deta

Yehi woh log hain jo kehtay hain kay jo log rasool-lullah kay pass hain unn per kuch kharach na kero yahan tak kay woh idhar udhar ho jayen aur aasman-o-zamin kay kul khazaney Allah Taalaa ki milkiyat hain lekin yeh munfiq bey samajh hain

Yeh kehtay hain kay agar hum abb lot ker madina jayen gay to izzat wala wahan say zillat walay ko nikal dey ga. Suno! Izzat to sirf Allah Taalaa kay liye aur uss kay rasool kay liye aur eman daaron kay liye hai lekin yeh munafiq jantay nahi
Aey musalmano! Tumharay maal aur tumhari auladen tumhen Allah kay ziker say ghafil na ker den aur jo aisa keren woh baray hi ziyan kaar log hain

Aur jo kuch hum ney tumhen dey rakha hai uss mein say (humari raah mein) iss say pehaly kharach kero kay tum mein say kissi ko maut aajaye to kehney lagay aey meray perwerdigar! Mujhay to thori dare ki mohlat kiyon nahi deta? Kay mein sadqa keroon aur nek logon mein say ho jaon
Aur jab kissi ka muqarrar waqt aajata hai phir ussay Allah Taalaa hergiz mohlat nahi deta aur jo kuch tum kertay ho uss say Allah Taalaa bakhoobi ba khabar hai
Tamam cheez jo aasmanon aur zamin mein hain Allah ki paki biyan kerti hain ussi ki saltanat hai aur ussi ki tareef hai aur woh her her cheez per qadir hai
Ussi ney tumhen peda kiya hai so tum mein say baazay to kafir hain aur baaz eman walay hain aur jo kuch tum ker rahey ho Allah Taalaa khoob dekh raha hai
Ussi ney aasmanon ko aur zamin ko adal-o-himat say peda kiya ussi ney tumhari sooraten banaeen aur boht achi banaeen aur ussi ki taraf lotna hai
Woh aasman-o-zamin ki her her cheez ka ilm rakhta hai aur jo kuch tum chupao aur jo zahir kero woh (sab ko) janta hai. Allah to seenon ki baaton tak ko jannay wala hai
Kiya tumharay pass iss say pehlay kay kafiron ki khabar nahi phonchi? Jinhon ney apney aemaal ka wabaal chakh liya aur jin kay liye dard naak azab hai

Yeh iss liey kay unn kay pass unn kay rasool wazeh dalaeel ley ker aaye to unhon ney keh diya kay kiya insan humari rehnumaee keray ga? Pus inkar ker diya aur mun pher liya aur Allah ney bhi bey niazi ki aur Allah to hi boht bey niaz sab khoobiyon wala

Inn kafiron ney khayal kiya hai kay doobara zinda na kiye jayen gay aap key dijiye kay kiyon nahi Allah ki qasam! Tum zaroor doobara uthaye jao gay phir jo tum ney kiya hai uss ki khabar diye jaogay aur Allah per yeh bilkul aasan hai
So tum Allah per aur uss kay rasool per aur uss noor per jissay hum ney nazil farmaya hai eman laao aur Allah Taalaa tumharay her amal per ba-khabar hai

Jiss din tum sab ko uss jama honey kay din jama keray ga wohi din hai haar jeet ka aur jo shaks Allah per eman laa ker nek amal keray Allah uss say uss ki buraiyan door ker dey ga aur ussay jannaton mein dakhil keray ga jin kay neechay nehren beh rahi hain jin mein woh hamesha hamesha rahen gay. Yehi boht bari kaamyabi hai
Aur jin logon ney kufur kiya aur humari aayaton ko jhutlaya wohi (sab) jahannumi hain (jo) jahannum mein hamesha rahen gay woh boht bura thikana hai
Koi museebat Allah ki ijazat kay baghair nahi phonch sakti jo Allah per eman laye Allah uss kay dil ko hidayat deta hai aur Allah her cheez ko khoob jannay wala hai
(logo) Allah ka kehna mano aur rasool ka kehna mano. Pus agar tum aeyraaz kero to humaray rasool kay zimmay sirf saaf saaf phoncha dena hai
Allah kay siwa koi mabood-e-bar haq nahi aur mominon ko Allah hi per tawakkal rakhna chahaiye

Aey eman walo! Tumhari baaz biwiyan aur baaz bachay tumharay dushman hain pus inn say hoshiyaar rehna aur agar tum moaf kerdo aur dar-guzar ker jao aur bakhsh do to Allah Taalaa baskshney wala meharban hai
Tumharay maal aur aulad to sirasir tumahri aazmaeesh hain aur boht bara ajar Allah kay pass hai

Pus jahan tak tum say ho sakay Allah say dartay raho aur suntay aur maantay chalay jao aur Allah ki raah mein kheyraat kertay raho jo tumhara liye behtar hai aur jo shaks apney nafs ki hirss say mehfooz rakha jaye wohi kaamyab hai

Agar tum Allah ko acha qarz do gay (yani uss ki raah mein kharach kero gay) to woh ussay tumharay liye barhata jaye ga aur tumharay gunah bhi moaf farma dey ga Allah bara qadar daan bara burd baar hai
Woh posheeda aur zahir ka jannay wala hai zabardast hikmat wala (hai)

Aey nabi! (apni ummat say kaho kay) jab tum apni biwiyon ko tallaq dena chahao to unn ki iddat (kay dino kay aaghaaz) mein unhen tallaq do aur iddat ka hisab rakho aur Allah say jo tumhara perwerdigar hai dartay raho na tum enhen inn kay gharon say nikalo aur na woh (khud) niklen haan yeh aur baat hai kay woh khuli buraee ker bethen yeh Allah ki muqarrar kerda hadden hain jo shaks Allah ki haddon say aagay barh jaye uss ney yaqeenan apney upper zulm kiya tum nahi jantay shayad iss kay baad Allah Taalaa koi naee baat peda ker dey

Pus jab yen aurten apni iddat poori kerney kay qarib phonch jayen to unhen ya to qaeeday kay mutabiq apney nikkah mein rehney do ya dastoor kay mutabiq enhen alag kerdo aur aapas mein do aadil shakson ko gawah kerlo aur Allah ki raza mandi kay liye theek theek gawahi do. Yehi hai woh jiss ki naseehat ussay ki jati hai jo Allah per aur qayamat kay din per eman rakhta ho aur jo shaks Allah say darta hai Allah uss kay liye chutkaray ki shakal nikal deta hai

Aur ussay aisi jagah say rozi deta hai jiss ka ussay guman bhi na ho aur jo shaks Allah per tawakkal keray ga Allah ussay kafi hoga. Allah Taalaa apna kaam poora ker kay hi rahey ga. Allah Taalaa ney her cheez ka aik andaza muqarrar ker rakha hai

Tumhari aurton mein say jo aurten hez say na umeed ho gaee hon agar tumhen shuba ho to unn ki muddat teen maheeney hai aur unn ki bhi jinhen hez aana shuroo hi na hua ho aur hamila aurton ki iddat unn kay waza-e-hamal hai aur jo shaks Allah Taalaa say daray ga Allah uss kay (her) kaam mein aasani ker dey ga
Yeh Allah ka hukum hai jo uss ney tumhari taraf utara hai aur jo shaks Allah say daray ga Allah uss kay gunah mita dey ga aur ussay bara bhari ajar dey ga

Tum apni taqat kay mutabiq jahan tum rehtay ho wahan inn (tallaq wali) aurton ko rakho aur enhen tang kerney kay liye takleef na phonchao aur agar woh hamal say hon to jab tak bacha peda ho lay enhen kharach detay raha kero phir agar tumharay kehney say wohi doodh pilayen to tum enehn inn ki ujrat dey do aur ba-hum munasib tor per mashwara ker liya kero aur agar tum aapas mein kash-ma-kash kero to iss kay kehney say koi aur doodh pilaye gi

Kushadgi walay ko apni kushadgi say kharach kerna chahaiye aur jiss per uss kay rizq ki tangi ki gaee ho ussay chahaiye kay jo kuch Allah ney ussay dey rakha hai ussi mein say (apni hasb-e-heysiyat) dey kissi shaks ko Allah takleef nahi deta magar utni hi jitni taqat ussay dey rakhi hai Allah tangi kay baad aasani aur faraghat bhi ker dey ga
Aur boht si basti walon ney apney rab kay hukum say aur uss kay rasoolon say sir taabi ki aur hum ney bhi unn say sakht hisab kiya aur unhen azab diya unn dekha (sakht) azab
Pus unhon ney apney kartoot ka maza chakh liya aur anjam kaar unn ka khasara hi hua
Unn kay liye Allah Taalaa ney sakht azab tayyar ker rakha hai pus Allah say daro aey aqal mand eman walo. Yaqeenan Allah ney tumhari taraf naseehar utaar di hai

(yani) rasool jo tumhen Allah kay saaf saaf ehkaam parh ker sunata hai takay unn logon ko jo eman layen aur nek amal keren woh tareekiyon say roshni ki taraf ley aaye aur jo shaks Allah per eman laye aur nek amal keray Allah ussay aisi jannaton mein dakhil keray ga jiss kay neechay nehren jari hain jin mein yeh hamesha hamesha rahen gay. Be-shak Allah ney ussay behtareen rozi dey rakhi hai

Allah woh hai jiss ney saat aasaman banaye aur issi kay misil zaminen bhi. Iss ka hukum inn kay darmiyan utarta hai takay tum jaan lo kay Allah her cheez per qadir hai aur Allah Taalaa ney her cheez ko ba-aetbaar ilm gher rakha hai

Aey nabi! Ji ss cheez ko Allah ney aap kay liye halal ker diya hai ussay aap kiyon haram kertay hain? (Kiya) aap apni biwiyon ki raza mandi hasil kerna chahatay hain aur Allah bakhshney wala reham kerney wala hai
Tehqeeq kay Allah Taalaa ney tumharay liye qasmon ka khol daalna muqarrar ker diya hai aur Allah Taalaa tumhara kaar saaz hai aur wohi (pooray) ilm wala hikmat wala hai

Aur yaad ker jab nabi ney apni baaz aurton say aik posheeda baat kahi pus jab uss ney uss baat ki khabar ker di aur Allah ney apney nabi ko iss per aagah ker diya to nabi ney thori si baat to bata di aur thori si taal gaye phir jab nabi ney apni biwi ko yeh baat bataee to woh kehnay lagi iss ki khabar aap ko kiss ney di. Kaha sab jannay walay poori khabar rakhney walay Allah ney mujhay yeh batlaya hai

(aey nabi ki dono biwiyo!) agar tum dono Allah kay samney tauba kerlo (to boht behtar hai) yaqeenan tumharay dil jhuk paren hain aur agar tum nabi kay khilaf aik doosray ki madad kero gi pus yaqeenan uss ka kaar saaz Allah hai aur jibraeel hain aur nek ehal-e-eman aur inn kay ilawa farishtay bhi madad kerney walay hain

Agar (woh) payghumbar tumhen tallaq dey den to boht jald enhen inn ka rab! Tumharay badlay tum say behtar biwiyan inayat farmaye ga jo islam waliyan eman waliyan tauba kerney waliyan ibadat baja laaney waliyan rozay rakhney waliyan hongi baiwa aur kanwariyan

Aey eman walo! Tum apney aap ko aur apney ghar walon ko uss aag say bachao jiss ka endhan insan hain aur pathar jiss per sakht dil mazboot farishtay muqarrar hain jinhen jo hukum Allah Taalaa deta hai uss ki na farmani nahi kertay bulkay jo hukum diya jaye baja laatay hain
Aey kafiro! Aaj tum uzur aur bahana mat kero. Tumhen sirf tumharay kartoot ka badla diya jaraha hai

Aey eman walo! Tum Allah kay samney sachi khalis tauba kero. Qareeb hai kay tumhara rab tumharay gunah door kerday aur tumhen aisi jannaton mein dakhil keray jin kay neechay nehren jari hain. Jiss din Allah Taalaa nabi ko aur eman daron ko jo inn kay sath hain ruswa na keray ga. Inn ka noor inn kay samney aur inn kay dayen dor raha hoga. Yeh duayen kertay hongay aey humaray rab humen kaamil noor ata farma aur humen bakhsh dey yaqeenan tu her cheez per qadir hai
Aey nabi! Kafiron aur munafiqon say jihad kero aur inn per sakhti kero inn kay thikana jahannum hai aur woh boht buri jagah hai

Allah Taalaa ney kafiron kay liye nooh ki aur loot ki biwi ki misal biyan farmaee yeh dono humaray bandon mein say do (shaista aur) nek bandon kay ghar mein thin phir unn ki enhon ney khayanat ki pus woh dono (nek banday) inn say Allah kay (kissi azab ko) na rok sakay aur hukum dey diya gaya (aey aurton) dozakh mein janey walon kay sath tum dono bhi chali jao

Aur Allah Taalaa ney eman walon kay liye firaon ki biwi ki misal biyan farmaee jabkay uss ney dua ki aey meray rab! Meray liye apney pass jannat mein muqam bana aur mujhay firaon say aur uss kay amal say bacha aur mujhay zalim logon say khulasi dey

Aur (misal biyan farmaee) marium bint-e-imran ki jiss ney apney namoos ki hifazat ki phir hum ney apni taraf say uss mein jaan phook di aur (marium) uss ney apney rab ki baaton aur uss ki kitabon ki tasdeeq ki aur ibadat guzaron mein say thi
Boht babarkat hai woh (Allah) jiss kay hath mein badshaee hai aur jo her cheez per qudrat rakhnay wala hai
Jiss nay mot aur hayat ko iss liye peda kiya kay tumhen aazmaye kay tum mein say achay kaam kon kerta hai aur woh ghalib (aur) bakhshnay wala hai
Jiss ney saat aasman uper talay banaye (to aey dekhnay walay) Allah Rehman ki pedaish mein koi bey-zaabtagi na dekhay ga
Doobara (nazren daal ker) dekhley kiya koi shigaaf bhi nazar aaraha hai

Phir dohra ker do do baar dekhley teri nigah teri taraf zalil(o-aajiz) hoker thaki hui lot aayegi.Be-shak hum ney aasman duniya ko chiraghon (sitaron) say aarasta kiya aur enehn shetanon kay maarnay ka zariya banadiya aur shetanon kay liye hum ney (dozakh ka jalanay wala) azab tayyar kerdiya
Aur apnay rab kay sath kafur kernay walon kay liye jahannum ka azab hai aur woh kiya hi buri jagah hai
Jab iss mein yeh daaley jayengey to iss ki baray zor ki aawazen sunen gey aur woh josh maar rahi hogi
Qareeb hai kay (abhi) gussay kay maaray phat jaye jab kabhi iss mein koi giroh dala jayega uss say jahannum kay daroghay poochen gey kay kiya tumharay pass daranay wala koi nahi aaya tha
Woh jawab dengey kay be-shak aaya tha lekin hum ney ussay jhutlaya aur hum ney kaha kay Allah taalaa ney kuch bhi naazil nahi farmaya tum boht bari gumrahi mein hi ho
Aur kahen gey kay agar hum suntay hotay ya aqal rakhtay hotay to dozakhiyon mein (shareek) na hotay
Pus unho ney apney jurum ka iqbal kerlia abb yeh dozakhi dafa hon (door hon)
Be-shak jo log apnay perwerdigaar say ghaeebana tor per dartay rehtay hain unkay liye bakhhsish hai aur bara sawab hai
Tum apni baton ko chupao ya zahir kero woh to seenon ki posheedgiyon ko bhi bakhoobi jaanta hai
Kiya wohi na janay jiss nay peda kiya? phir woh bareek been aur bakhabar bhi ho
Woh zaat jiss ney tumharay liye zamin ko past-o-mutee kerdia takay tum uss ki raahon mein chaltay phirtay raho aur Allah ki roziyan khao (piyo) ussi ki taraf (tumhen) ji ker uth khara hona hai
Kiya tum iss baat say bey khof hogaye ho kay aasmanon wala tumhen zamin mein dhansa dey aur achanak zamin laraznay lagay
Ya kiya tum iss baat say nadar hogaye ho kay aasmanon wala tum per pathar barsa dey? Phir to tumhen maloom ho hi jayega kay mera darna kaisa tha
Aur inn say pehlay logon ney bhi jhutlaya tha to dekho inn per mera azab kaisa kuch hua

Kiya yeh apnay uper per kholay huye aur (kabhi kabhi) sametay huye(urnay walay) parindon ko nahi dekhtay enhen (Allah) Rehman hi (hawa-o-faza mein) thaamay huye hai. be-shak her cheez uski nigah mein hai
Siwaye Allah kay tumhara woh konsa lashkar hai jo tumhari madad kersakay kafir to sarasar dhokay hi mein hain
Agar Allah taalaa apni rozi rok ley to batao kon hai jo phir tumhen rozi dey ga? bulkay (kafir) to sirkashi aur bidaknay per arr gaye hain
Acha woh shaks zada hidayat wala hai jo apnay mun kay bal ondha hoker chalay ya woh jo seedha (peron kay bal) raah-e-raast per chala ho
kehdijiye kay wohi (Allah) ahi jiss ney tumhen peda aur tumharay kaan aackhen aur dil banaye tum boht hi kum shukerguzari kertay ho
Kehdijiye! kay wohi hai jiss ney tumhen zamin mein pehla diya aur usski taraf tum ikhattay kiye jaogey
(Kafir) poochtay hain kay woh wada kab zahir hoga agar tum sachay ho (to batao)
Aap kehdijiye kay iss ka ilm to Allah hi ko hai mein to sirf khulay tor per aagah kerdenay wala hon
Jab yeh log iss waday ko qareeb tar paalen gey uss waqt unn kafiron kay chehray bigar jayen gey aur kehdia jayega kay yehi hai jissay tum talab kiya kertay thay
Aap kehdijiye acha agar mujhay aur meray saathiyonko Allah taalaa halak kerdey ya hum per reham keray (bahar sooratyeh to batao) kay kafirron ko dardnaak azab say kon bachaye ga
Aap kehdijiye! kay wohi Rehman hai hum to iss per eman la chukay aur issi per humara bharosa hai tumhenunqareeb maloom hojayega kay sareeh gumrahee mein kon hai
Aap keh dijiye !kay acha yeh to batao kay agar tumharay (peenay ka) paani zamin mein utar jaye to kon hai jo tumharay liye nithra hua paani laye
Noon qasam hai qalam ki aur uss ki jo kuch kay who (farishtay) likhtay hain
Tu apany rab kay fazal say deewana nhai hai
Aur be-shak teray liye bey inteha ajar hai
Aur be-shak tu both baray (umda) ikhlaq per hai
Pus abb tub hi dekhlega aur yeh bhi dekh len gay
Kay tum main say kon fitnay mein pera hua hai
Be-shak tera rab apni raah say behaknay walon ko khoob jaanta hai aur wohraah yafta logon ko tu bakhoobi jaanta hai
Pus to jhutlanay walon kin a maan
who to chahtay hain kay tu zara dheela ho to yeh bhi dheelay par jayen
Aur tu kissi aisay shaks ka bhi kaha na manna jo ziyada qasmen khanay wala
Beywaqar’ qammena aibgo chughalkhor
Bhalaee say roknay wala had say barh janay wala gunehgaar
Gardan kash phir sath hi beynasab ho
Us ski sirkashi sirf iss liye hai kay who maal wala aur beton wala hai
Jab uss kay samnay humari aayaten parhi jaati hain to keh deta hai kay yeh to aglon kay qissay hain
Hum bhi us ski soond (naak) per daagh dengay
Be-shak hum ney unhen issi tarah aazmaliya jiss tarah hum ney baagh walon ko aazmaya tha job unho ney qasman khayen kay subha hotay hi iss baagh kay phal utar lengay
Aur inshaAllah na kaha
Pus iss per teray rab ki janib say aik bala chaaron taraf ghoom gaee aur yeh so hi rahey thay
Pus who baagh aisa hogaya jesay kati hui kheti
Abb subha hotay hi unho ney aik doosray ko aawazen dea
Kay agar tumhen phal utarnay hain to apni kheti per saweray hi saweray chal paro
phir yeh sab chupkay chupkay yeh baten kertay huye chalay
Kay aaj kay din koi miskeen tumharay pass na aanay paye
Aur lapkay huye subha subha gaye (Samajh rahey thay) kay hum qaaboo paagaye
job unho ney boogh dekha to kehnay logay yaqeenan hum raasta photo gaee
Nahi nahi bulkay humari qismat phoot gaee
Inn sab main jo behtar tha uss nay kaha kay mein tumsay na kehta tha kay tum Allah ki pakeezgi q iyon nahi biyan kertay
To sab kehnay lagay humara rab pak hai be-shak hum hi zaalim thay
Phir who aik doosray ki taraf rukh kerkay aapas mein malamat kernay lagay
kehnay lagay haaye afsos! Yaqeenan hum sirkash thay
Kiya ajab hai kay humara rab humen iss say behtar badla dey dey hum to abb apnay rab say hi aarzoo rakhtay hain
Yun hi aafat aati hai aur aakhirat ki aafat both bari hai kaash! Unhen samajh hoti
Perhezgaaron kay liye unkay rab kay pass nematon waali jannaten hain
Kiya hum musalmanon ko misil gunehgaaron kay kerdengay
Tumhen kiya hogaya kaisay foislay ker rahey ho
Kiya tumharay pass koi kitab hai jiss mein tum parhtay ho
Kay iss mein tumhari manmaani baten hon
Yea tum nay hum say kuch qasman li hain ?jo qzayamat tak baaqi rahen kay tumharay liye who sab hai jot um apni taraf say muqarrar kerlo
Inn say poochao to kay inn mein say kon iss baat ka zimeydaar (aur daaweydaar) hai
Kiya inn kay koi shareek hain? To chahiye kay apnay apnay shareekor ko ley aayen agar yeh sachey hain
Jiss din pindali khol di jayegi aur sajday kay liye bulaye jayengay to (sajdah) na ker saken gay
Nigahen neechi hongi aur unn per zillat-o-khhuaari cha rahi hogi halankay yeh sajday kay liye (uss waqt bhi) bulaye jaatay thay jabkay sahih saalim thay
Pus mujhay aur iss kalaam ko jhutlanay walay ko chor dey hum unhen iss tarah aahista aahista bhi na hoga
Aur mein unhen dheel doonga be-shak meri tadbeer bari mazboot hai
Kiya tu inn say koi ujrat chahta hai jiss kay tawaan say yeh dabay jatay hon
Ya kiya inn kay pass ilm-e-ghaib hai jissay who likhtay hon
Pus tu apnay rab kay hokum ka sabar say (intezar ker) aur machli walay ki tarah na ho jo jab kay uss nay ghum ki holat main dua ki
Agar uss kay rab ki nemat na paaleti to yaqeenan who buray haalon main chatiyal medaan mein daal diya jata
ussay uss kay rab nay phir nawaza aur ussay nak-kaaron main kerdiya
Aur qareeb hai kay kafir apni tez nigahon say aap ko phusla den jab kabhi quran suntay hain aur keh detay hain yeh to zaroor deewana hai
Darhaqeeqat yeh (quran) to tamam jahan walon kay liye sarasir naseehat hi hai
Sabit honey wali
Sabit honay wali kiya hay
Aur tujhay kiya maloom kay wo sabit shuda kiya hay
Is khrka deney wali ko samood aur aad ney jhutla dia tha
(jis kay nateejay mein)samood to behad khufnak (aur onchi)awaz say halak ker diey gay
Aur aad behad tez o tund hawa say gharat ker diey gaey
Jis say in per lagatar sath rat aur aath din tak (Allah ney)musalat rakha.pus tum dekhtay kay yeh log zameen per istrah gir gaey jaisay kay khjoor kay khokhly tanay hon
Kiya in mein say koi bhi tujhay baqi nazar araha hy
Firoon aur iss say pehlay kay log aur jin ki bastiyan ulat di gaein unhon ney bhi khataein kiein
Aur apney rab kay rasool ki nafarmani ki(bilakhir)Allah ney unhein(bhi)zaberdast girift mein ly lia
jab pani mein tughyani agai to us waqat hum ney tumhein kashti mein charha liya
Takay is say tumharay liey nasehat aur yad gar banadein aur(taky)yad rakhaney waly kan issy yad rakhein
Pus jab kay soor mein ik phonk phonki jaey gi
Aur zameen aur pahar utha liey jaein gay aur ik hi chot mein reza reza ker dey jaein gay
Us din ho parnay wali(qiyamat)ho paray gi
aur asman phat jaey ga aur us din bilkol boda ho jaey ga
Is kay kinaron per farishtay hon gay aur tery perwardigar ka arsh us din aath(farishtay)apney opper uthaey hon gay
Us din tum sab samney pesh kiey jao gay tumhara koi bhed poshida na rahy ga
So jissay uska nama e amal us kay daein hath mein diya jaey ga to wo kehnay lagay ga kay lo mera nama e amal parh lo
Mujhy to kamil yaqeen tha kay mujhy apna hisab milna hay
Pus wo ik dil pasand zindagi mein ho ga
Bulan o bala jant mein
Jiss kay meway jhokay paray hon gay
(in say kaha jaey ga) kay mazay say khao piyo apney in amal kay badlay jo tum ney guzishta zamanay mein kiy
Lakin jissay uss(kay amal)ki kitab us kay baein hath mein di jaey gi wo to kahy ga kay kash kay mujhy meri kitab di hi na jati
Aur mein janta hi na kay hisab kiya hay
Kash ! kay moot (mera)kam hi tamam kerdyti
Mery maal ney bhi mujhy kuch nafa na diya
Mera ghalba bhi mujhsy jata raha
(hokum hoga)issay pakar lo phir issy toq phyna do
Phir isay dozakh mein dal do
Phir issy asi zanjeer mein jiss ki paymaish satter hath ki hay jaker do
Beshak yeh Allah azmat walay per iman na rakhta tha
Aur miskeen kay khilanay per raghbat na dilata tha
Pus aj iska na koi dost hay
Aur na siway peep kay is ki koi ghiza hay
Jissay ghunahgaron kay siwa koi nai kahey ga
Pus mujhy qasam hay un chezon ki jinhein tum dekhtay ho
Aur on chezon ki jinhein tum nahi dekhtay
Kay be sahk yeh(quran)buzurgh rasool ka qool hay
Yeh kisi shair ka qool nahi(afsos)tumhein bohat kam yaqeen hay
Aur na kisi kahin ka qool hay(afsos)bohat kam nasehat lay rahay ho
(ye to)rab ul alameen ka utara howa hay
Aur ager yeh hum per koi bhi bat bana lyta
To albata hum iska dahana hath paker letay
Phir is ki sheyrag kaat detay
Phir tum mein say koi bhi mujhy issy roknay wala na hota
Yaqeenan yeh quran perhezgaron kay liye nasehat hay
Humein pori tarah maloom hay kay tum mein say baaz iskay jhotlanay waly hein
beshak (yeh jhutlan)kafiron per hasrat hay
Aur beshak (o shuba)yeh yaqeni haq hay
Pus to apney rab e azeem ki paki biyan ker
Aik sawal kernay walay ney uss azab ka swal kiya jo wazeh honay wala hay
Kafiron per jissay koi hatanay wala nahi
Uss Allah ki taraf say jo seerhiyon wala hay
Jiss ki taraf farishtay aur rooh charhtay hein aik din mein jiss ki miqdaar pachas hazar saal ki hay
Pus to achi tarah sabar ker
Beshak yeh uss (azab) ko door samajh rahe hein
Hum issay qareeb hi dekhatay hein
Jiss din aasman misil tel ki talchat kay hojayega
Aur pohaar misil rangeen oon kay hojey gay
Aur koi dost kissi dost ko na poochay ga
(Halankay) aik doosray ko dikha diye jaeyen gay gunehgar uss din kay azab kay badlay fidye mein apney beton ko
Apni biwi ko aur apney bhai ko
Aur apney kunbay ko jo issay panah deta tha
Aur roy e zameen kay sab logon ko dena chahyega takay yeh ussay nijat dilaye
Mager hergiz yeh na hoga yaqeenan wo shoal wali (aag)hai
Jo mun aur sar ki khal khench lynay wali hay
Wo her us shaks ko pukaray gi jo pechay hata aur mun morta hay
Aur jama ker kay samnbhal rakhta hay
Beshak insan baray kachy dil wala banaya gaya hay
Jab is say musibat puhanchti hay to har bara uthta hay
aur jab rahat milti hay to bukhul kernay lagta hay
Mager wo namazi
J apnai namaz per hameshagi kernay walay hein
Aur jin kay maalon mein mukarra hisa hay
Mangnay walon ka bhi aur sawal say bachnay walon ka bhi
Aur jo insaf kay din per yaqeen rakhtay hein
Aur jo apney rab kay azab say dertay rehtay hein
Beshak un kay rab ka azab bekhof honay ki chez nahi
Aur jo log apni sharm gahon ki (haram say)hifazat kertay hein
Han unki biwion aur londion kay bary mein jin kay wo malik hein.unhein koi malamat nahi
Ab jo koi is kay ilawa(rah)dhonday ga to asay log had say guzar janay walay hongay
Aur jo apni amanton ka aur apney qol o qarar ka pass rakhtay hein
Aur jo apni gawahion per sidhay aur qaim rehtay hein
Aur jo apni namazon ki hifazat kertay hein
Yehi log janton mein izat walay hongay
Pus kafoiron ko kia hogaya hay kay wo teri taraf dortay atay hein
Daein aur baein say giroh kay giroh
Kia in mein say her ik ki tawaqa yeh hay kay wo nematon wali janat mein dakhil kia jaey ga
(aisa) hergiz nahi ho ga hum ney unhein is(chez) say paida kia hay jiss say wo jantay hein
Pus mujhy qasam hay mashrikon aur maghribon kay rab ki (kay)hum yaqeenan qadir hein
Is per kay in kay ewaz in say achay log lay ayein aur hum aajiz nahi hein
Pus to inhein jagherta khelata chor day yahan ytak kay yeh apney us din say jamilein jis ka un say wada kia jata hay
Jis din yeh qabron say dortay hoy niklein gay goya kay wo kisi jaga ki taraf tez tez jarahy hein
In ki ankhein jhoki hoi hongi in per zilat charahi hon gi yeh hay wo din jis ka un say wada kia jata tha
Yaqeenan hum ney Nooh(alh e salam)ko inki qom ki taraf bheja kay apni qom ko darado (aur khabaerdar kerdo) isss say pehlay kay inkay pass dardnak azab ajaye
(Nooh alh e salam ney)kaha aey meri qom mein tumhein saaf saaf daranay wala hun
Kay tum Allah ki ibadat kero aur issi say daro aur mera kaha maano
To wo tumhary gunha bukhsh day ga aur tumhein aik waqat mukarrera tak chor dega YaqeenanAllah ka wada jab aajata hay to moakhir nahi hota kaash kay tumhien samjh hoti
(nooh alh e salam ney) kaha aey mery perwardigar!mein ney apni qom ko raat din teri taraf bulaya hai
Mager meray bulanay say yeh log aur ziyada bhagnay lagay
Mein ney jab khabi unhein teri bakhsish kay liye bulaya unhon ney apni ungliyan apney kaano mein daal lein aur apney kapron ko orh liya aur urh gaye aur bara takabur kiya
Phir mein ney unhein ba-awaz buland bulaya
Aur beshak mein ney insay elaaniya bhi kaha aur chupkay chupkay bhi
Aur mein ney kaha kay apney rab say apney gunha bakhswao(aur maafi mango)wo yaqeenan bara bakhsnay wala hay
Wo tum per aasman ko khob barsata hua chor dega
Aur tumhein khob pay dar pay maal aur olaad mein taraqi dega Aur tumhein baaghat dega aur tumharay liye nikaal dega
Tumhein kiya hogaya hay kay tum Allah ki bartari ki aqeedah nahi rakhtay
Halankay uss ney tumhein tarah tarah say paida kiya hay
Kiya tum nahi dekhtay kay Allah Talah ney kiss tarah opper talay sath asman paida ker diey hein
Aur in mien chand ko khob jagmata banaya hai aur sooraj ko roshan chiragh banaya hay
Aur tum ko zameen say aik (khass ehtimam say)ugaya hai(aur paida kiya hai)
Phir tumhein issi mein lota leya jaeyga aur(aik khass tareeqay)say phir nikalay ga
Aur tumharay liye zameen ko Allah Taalaa ney farsh banadiya hay
Takay tum uski kushada raahon mein chalo phiro
Nooh(alh e salam) ney kaha aey meray perwardigar!in logon ney meri to nafarmani ki aur aison ki farmanbardari ki jinkay maal o olaad ney inko(yaqeenan)nuksan hi mein barhaya hai
Aur in logon ney bara sakht fareeb kiya
Aur kaha unhon ney kay hergiz apney maaboodon ko na chorna aur na wad aur suwaa aur yaghoos aur yaooq aur nasar ko(chorna)
Aur unhon ney bohat say logon ko gumrah kiya (elaahi)tu in zaalimon ki gumrahi aur barha
Yeh log ba sabab apney gunaahon kay dabo deygay aur jahanum mein phuncha diey gaye aur Allah kay siwa apna koi madadgar unhonay na paya
Aur Nooh(alh e salam)ney kaha kay aey mery paalnay walay! To roy e zameen per kissi kafir ko rehnay sehnay wala na chor
Ager to enhen chor dega to (yaqeenan)yeh tery (aur)bandon ko(bhi)gumrah kardeingay aur yeh faajiron aur dheet kafiron hi ko janum deingay

Aey meray perwardigar!to mujhay aur meray maa baap aur jo eman ki halat mein meray ghar +mein aye aur tamam momin mardon aur auraton ko bakhsh dey aur kafiron ko siwaey barbadi key aur kissi baat mein na barha
Aey Muhammad (P.B.U.H)) aap keh dein kay mujhy wahi ki gai hay kay jinno ki ik jamat ney (quran)suna or kaha kay hum ney ajeeb quarn suna hay
Jo rah e rast ki tarf rahnumai kerta hay hum is per iman la chukay (ab)hum her giz kisi ko bhi apney rab ka sharek na banein gay
Aur beshak hamary rab ki shan bari buland hay aur na us ney kisi ko (apni) biwi banaya hay aur na beta
Aur yeh kay kehtay rahein hein hamary nadan logAllah kay bary mein bhat khilaf e haq batein
Aur hum to yehi samjhtay rahy kay namumkin hay kay insan aur jinnat Allah per jhoti batein lagaein
Baat yeh hay kay chand insan baaz jinnat say panah talab kertay thy jiss say jinnat apnai serkashi mein aur barh gay
Aur (insano)ney bhi tum jino ki tarah guman ker liya tha kay Allah kisi ko na bhyjay ga(ye kisi ko dobara zinda an kery ga)
Aur hum ney asman ko tatool ker dekha to ussy sakht chokidaron aur sakht sholon say pur paya
Iss say pehlay hum baatein suneinkay liye asman mein jagah jagah beth jaya kertay thy .jo bhi kan lagata hay wo ik sholay ko apni taak mein pata hay
Hum nahi jantay kay zameen walon kay sath kisi burai ka irada kiya gaya hay ya in kay rab ka irada in kay sath bhalai ka hay
Aur yeh kay(beshak)baaz to hum mein nekokar hein aur baaz iskay barakas bhi hein hum mukhtalif tareeqon say batay hoy hein
Aur hum ney samajh liya hay kay hum Allah Talah ko zameen mein hergiz aajiz nahi ker saktay aur na hum bhag ker issy hara saktay hein
Hum to hidayat ki bat suntay hi is per eman la chukay aur jo bhi apney rab per eman laye ga us say na kisi nuksan ka andesha hay na zulm-o-sitam ka
Han hum mein baaz to musalman hein baaz be-insaf hein pus jo farmaberdar hogay unhon ney to raah-e-raast ka qasad kiya
Aur jo zalim hein wo jahanum ka endhen bangay
Aur (aey Nabi yeh bhi khay do )kay log raaah e rast per seedhay rehtay to yaqeenan hum enhein both waffir pani pilatay
Takay hum iss munhein azmalein aur jo sahks apney perwedigar kay zikar say mun pherlay ga to Allah Talah ussay sakht azab mein mubtila kerdayga
Aur yeh kay mesjidein sirf Allah hi kay liye khass hein pus Allah Talah kay sath kissi aur ko na pukaro
Aur jab Allah ka banda uss ki ibadat kay liye khara hoa to qareeb tha kay wo bheer ki bheer ban ker uss per pal paren
Aap keh dijey kay mein to sirf apney rab hi ko pukarta hon aur iss kay sath kissi ko shareek nahi banata
Keh dijey kay mujhy tumhary kissi nuksan nafa ka ikhtiyar nahi
Kehdijey kay mujhy hergiz koi Allah say bacha nahi sakta aur mein hergiz uss kay siwa koi jay e panah bhi paa nahi sakta

Albata (mera kam) Allah ki baat aur iss kay peghamaat(logon ko)phuncha dena hia(abb)jo bhi Allah aur uss kay rasool kin a maanay ga uss kay liye jahanum ki aag hai jiss mein aisay log hamesha rahengay
(unki aankh na khulaygi)Yahan tak kay ussay dekhlen jiss ka unko wada diya jata hia pus unqareeb jaan lengay kay kiss ki jamat kum hai
Kehdijey kay mujhy maloom nahi kay jiss ka wada tum say kiya jata hai wo qareeb hia ya mera rab uss kay liye door ki muddat mukarrer keryga
Wo ghaib ka jannay wala hai aur apney ghaib per kisi ko mutlaa nahi kerta
Siwaey uss peyghamber kay jissay wo pasand kerley lekin usskay bhi aagay pechay pehraydar muqarrer kerdyta hai
Takay unkay apney rab kay paygham phoncha denay ka ilm hojaey.Allah talah ney unkay aas pass (ki tamam cheezon )ka ehaata ker rakha hai aur her cheez ki gintee ka shumaar ker rakha hai
Aey kapray mein lipatnay walay
Rat (kay waqat namaz) mein khary hojao mager kam
Adhi rat ya is say bhi kuch kam kerly
Ya is per barha dy aur quran ko thehar thehar kar (saf )parha ker
Yaqeenan hum tuj per bohat bhari bat anqareeb nazil kerein gay
Beshak rat ka uthna dil jamai kay liye intehai munasib hay aur bat ko bohat durust ker daynay wala hay
Yaqeena tujhay din mein bohat shughal rahta hay
To apney rab kay nam ka ziakr kiya ker aur tamam khalaiq say kat ker us ki taraf mutawajha ho ja
Mashriq o maghrib ka perwardigar jis ka koi maabood nahi to usko apna karsaz bana lay
Aur jo kuch wo kahy to sehta rah aur wazedari kay sath un say alag thalag rah
Aur mujhy aur in jhotlanay waly asoda hal logon ko chor day aur inhein zara si muhlat dy
Yaqeenan hamary han sakht biriyan hein aur sulagti haoi jahanum hay
Aur halq mein atakney wala khana hay aur dard deney wal azb
Jiss din zamen aur pahar thar thara jaein gzy aur phaar missal bhor bhori rait kay telon kay hojaein gay
Beshak hum ney tumhari taraf bhi tum per gawahi dynay wala rasool bhyj diya hay jaisa kay hum ney firoon kay pass rasol bhyja tha
To firoon ney us rasol kin a frmani ki to hum ney usy sakht (wabal ki)pakar mein paker liya
Tum ager kafir rahy to usdin kaisy panah pao gay jo din bachon ko burha ker day ga
Jiss dion asman phat jaey ga Allh Talah ka yeh wada ho ker hi rahnay wala hay
Beshak yeh nasehat hay pus jo chahey apney rab ki taraf rah ikhtiyar keray

Apka rab bakhobi janta hay ka yap aur aap kay sath kay logon ki ik jamat qareeb do tahai rat kay aur adhi rat kay aur ik tahai rat kay tahajud parhti hay aur rat din ka pora andaza Allah Talaa ko hi hay.wo (khob) janta hay kay tum is say hergiz na nibha sako gay pus isnay tum per meharbani ki lyhaza jitna qyran parhna tumhary liye asan ho itna hi parho wo janta hay kay tum mein baaz bimar bhi hongay baaz dosray zameen mein chal phir ker Allah Talah ka fazal (yani rozi bhi)talash kerein gay aur kuch log Allah talah ki rah mein jahad bhi kerein gay so tum basani jitna quran parh sako parho aur namaz ki pabandi rakho. Aur zakat dytay raha kero aur Allah Talah ko acha qarz do aur jo neki tum apney liye agay bhyjo gay ussy Allah talah kay han bhyter say bhyter aur sawab mein bohat ziyada pao gay ALLAH TALAH say moafi mangtay raho yaqeenan AllahTalah bakhshney wala meharban hy
Aey kapra orhnay waly
Khara ho ja aur agah ker day
Aur apney rab hi ki baraiyan biyan ker
Apney kapron ko pak rakha ker
Na paki ko chor day
Aur ahsan ker kay ziyada lynay ki khuwaish na ker
Aur apney rab ki rah mein sabar ker
Pus jab kay sor mein phonk mari jaey gi
To wo din bara sakht din hoga
(jo) Kafiron per asan na hoga
Mujhy aur usay chor day jissy mein ney akela paida kiya hay
Aur issy bohat sa maal dy rakha hay
Aur hazir bash ferzand bhi
Aur mein ney ussy bohat kushadigi dy rakhi hay
Phir bhi uski chahat hay kay mein usy or ziyada don
Nahi nahi wo hamari ayaton ka mukhalif hy
an qareeb mein usy ik sakht charhai charhaon ga
Us ney ghor ker kay tajweez ki
Usy halakat ho kaisi(tajweez)sochi
Wo phir gharat ho kis tarah andaza kiya
Us ney phir dekha
Phir teweri char hai or mun banaya
Phir pechay hat gaya aur ghoroor kiya
Aur khynay laga yeh to sirf jado hay jo naqal kiya jata hay
Siwaey insani kalam kay kuch bhi nahi
Mein anqareeb usy dfozakh mein dalon ga
aur tujhay kiya khaber kay dozakh kiya chez hay
Na wo baqi rakhti hay aur na chorti hay
Khal ko jholsa dyti hay
Aur is mein unnees(19)(farshtay mukarrar) hein

Hum ney dozakh kay daroghy say farishtay rakhein hein aur hum ney unki tadad sirf kafiron ki azmaish kay liye mukarrar ki hay takay ahl e kitab yaqeen ker lein.aur ahl e eman kay eman mein asafa ho jay aur ahl e kitab aur ahl e eman shak na kerien aur jin kay dilon mein bimari hay wo aur kafir kahein kay is biyan say Allah Talah jissy chata hay ghumrah kerta hay aur jissy chata hay hidayat dyta hay tery rab kay lashkaron ko us kay siwa koi nahi janta yeh to kul bani adam kay liye sar a sar pind o nasehat hay
Sach khyta hon qasam hay chand ki
Aur rat ki jab wo pechay hatay
Aur subha ki jab kay roshan hojaey
Kay (yaqeenan wo jahanum)bari chezon mein say ik hay
Bani adam ko daraney wali
(yani)ussayn jo tum mein say agay barhna chaey ya pechay hanta chaey
Her shaks apney amal kay badlay mein girwi hay
Magar daein hath walay
Kay wo baheshton mein (bethay hoy)gunehgaron say
Sawal kertay hongay
Tumhein dozakh mein kis chez ney dala
Wo jawab deingay kay hum namazi na thy
Na miskeeno ko khana khilatay thy
Aur hum bhas kernay waly(inkarion )ka sath dy ker bhas mubahisa mein mashghol raha kertay thy
Aur roz e jaza ko jhutlatay thy
Yahan tak kay humein mot agai
Pus inhein sifarish kernay walon ki sifarish nafa na dy gi
Inhein kiya hogaya hay?kay nasehat say mun mor rahy hein
Goya kay wo bidkay hoy gadhay hein
Jo sher say bhagaein hon
Balkay in mein say her shaks chata hay kay usay kholi hoi kitabein di jaein
Hergiz asa nahi (hosakta balkay)yeh qiyamat say bay khof hein
sachi bat to yeh hay kay yeh(quran)ik nasehat hay
Ab jo chahey issy nasehat hasil kery
Aur wo us waqat nasehat hasil kerein gay jab Allah Talah chahein wo issi laiq hein kay issy darein aur iss laiq bhi kay wo bakhshy
Mein qasam khata hun qayamat kay din ki
Aur qasam khata hun uss nafas ki jo malamat kernay wala ho
Kiya insan yeh khayal kert hai kay hum uss ki hadiyan jama kerengay hi nahi
Han zaror kerengay hum to qadir hain kay usski por por tak durust kerdein
Bulkay insan to chahta hai kay aagay aagay na farmaniyan kerta jaey
Poochata hai kay qayamat ka din kab aaye ga
Pus jiss waqat kay nigha pathra jaeygi
Aur chand benoor hojaey ga
Aur soraj aur chand jama kerdiye jaeingay
Uss din insan kahega kay aaj bhegnay ki jagah kahan hai
Nahi nahi koi panahgah nahi
Aaj to teray perwardigar ki tarf hi qarar gah hai
Aaj insan ko uss kay aagay bhejay huye aur peechay choray hoye say aagah kiya jaeyga
Bulkay insan khud apney upper aap hujjat hai
Agercha kitnay hi bahanay pesh keryga
(ay nabi) aap quran ko jadi (yaad kernay)kay liey apni zabaan ko herkat na den
Iss ka jama kerna aur (aap ki zaba say)perhna humaray zimmay hai
Hum jab issay parhlen to aap iss kay parhnay ki perwi kerein
Phir is ka wazeh ker dyna hamary zimy hay
Nahi nahi tum jaldi milnay wali(duniya) ki mohabat rakhtay ho
Aur akhrat ko chor bethy ho
Uss roz bohat say chehery ter o taza aur ba runaq hongay
Apney rab ki taraf dekhtay hongay
Aur kitnay chehry us din (bad ronaq aur) udas hongay
Samjhtay hongay kay in kay sath kamar toor dynay wala mamla ki jaey ga
Nahi nahi jab roz hansli tak phunchay gi
Aur kaha jaeyga koi char phonk kernay wala hay
Aur jan liya unsay kay yeh waqat judai hay
Aur pindli say pindli lipat jaey gi
Aj tery perwardigar ki taraf chalna hay
Us ney na to tasdeeq ki aur na namaz ada ki
Bulkay jhutlaya aur roh gatdani ki
Phir apney gher walon kay pass itrata hoya gaya
Afsos hay tujhay per hasrat hay tujh per
Waaye hai aur kharabi hay tery liye
Kiya insan yeh samjhta hay kay usy be kaar chor diay jaey ga
Kiya wo iki ghary pani ka katra na tha jo tapkaya gaya tha
Phir wo laho ka lothra hogay phir Allah ney usy paida kia aur durasat bana diya
Phir us say joray yani nar o mada banay
kiya (Allah Talah) iss (amar)per qadir nahi kay murday ko zinda kerday
Yaqeenan guzra hai insan per ik waqat zamanay mein jab kay yeh koi qabe e zikar chez na tha
Besahak hum ney insan ko milay julay nutfay say imtehan kay liye paida kiya aur uss ko sunta dekhta banaya
Hum ney ussay raah dikhai abb khua wo shukar guzar banay khua na shukra
Yaqeenaa hum ney kafiron kay liye zanjeeron aur toq aur sholon wali aag tayar ker rakhi hay
Besahk neek log wo jam piyein gay jiss ki azmaish kafiron ki hay
Jo aik chesma hai jiss say Allah kay banday piyen gay uss ki nehrein nikaal ley jaengay (jidher chahen)
Jo nazar poori kertay hein aur uss din say dartay hein jiss ki buraee charon taraf phel jaanay wali hia
Aur Allah Taalaa ki mohabat mein khana khilatay hein miskeen yateem aur qediyon ko
Hum to tumhein sirf Allah Taalaa ki raza mandi kay liye khilatay hein na tum say badla chatay hein na shuker guzari
Beshak hum apney perwardigar say uss din ka khof kertay hein jo udaasi aur sakhti wala hoga
Pus inhen Allah Taala ney uss din ki buraee say bacha liya aur inhen taazgi aur khushi phonchaee
Aut inhen inkay sabar kay badlay jannat aur reshmi libass ata farmaye
Yeh wahan takhton per takiey lagaey huye bethen gay na wahan aftab ki garmi dfekhein gay ja jaray ki sakhti
In jannaton kay saaye un per jhukey huye hongay aur inkay (meway aur)gunchay neechay latkaaey huye hongay
Aur in per chandi kay bartano aur in jaamon ka dor keraya jayega jo sheeshay kay hongay
Sheeshy bhi chandi kay jinko(saqi ney)andazay say nap rakha hoga
Aur inhein wahan wo jam pilaya jaey ga jin ki amezish zanjabeel ki hogi
Jaanat ki ik nehar say jiss ka nam salsabeel hay
Aur inkay ird gird ghoomtey phirtay hongay wo kumsin bachay jo hamesha rehnay walay hein jab tu unhein dekhay to samjhay key wo bikhray hoey sachay moti hein
Tu wahan jahan kahin bhi nazar daley ga saraser nematein aur azeem-ul-shan saltanat hi dekhay ga
In kay jismoon per sabz bareek aur motay reshmi kapray hongay aur enhen chandi kay kangan ka zewar pehnaya jaeyga aur inhein unka rab pak saaf sharab pilaey ga
(kaha jaeyga)kay yeh hai teray aemal ka badla aur tumhari koshish kiqadar ki gaee
Beshak hum ney tujh per ba tedreej quran nazil kiya hai
Pus to apney rab kay hokum per qaim rah aur in mein say kissi gunhagar ya na shukray ka kaha na maan
Aur apney rab kay naam ka subha o sham zikar kiya ker
Aur raat kay waqat uss kay saamnay sajday ker aur bohat raat tak uss ki tasbeeh kiya ker
Behak yeh log jaldi milnay wali(duniya) ko chahtay hein aur apney peechay aik baray bhari din ko choray detay hein
Hum ney inhein peda kiya aur hum ney hi in key jor aur bandhan mazboot kiey aur hum jab chahen in kay ewaz in jesay auron ko badal layen
Yaqeenan yeh to aik naseehat hai pus jo chahey apney rab ki raah lelay
Aur tum na chahogay magar yeh kay Allah Taalaa hi chahey beshak Allah Talah ilm wala ba hikmat hai
Jissay chahey apni rehmat mein daakhil kerley aur zaalimon kay liye uss ney dard naak azab tayyar ker rakha hai
Dil khush kun chalti hawaon ki qasam
Phir zor say jhonka denay walion ki qasam
Phir(abar ko) ubhaar ker peraganda kernay waliyon ki qasam
Phir haq o batil ko joda joda kerdenay walay
